[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'bum ka pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D8}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shata sAha sri ka prad nyA pAr mi tA/_bod skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_glegs bam thog ma/_bam po dang po/_/'di skad 
[\[1b.2\]]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri/_bya rgod 'phungs po la/_dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_thabs gcig ste/_thams cad kyang dgra 
[\[1b.3\]]bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang du gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_
[\[1b.4\]]khur bor ba/_rang gi don rab tu thob pa/_srid bar kun tu sbyor ba/_yongs su zad pa/_bka' yang dag bas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha 
[\[1b.5\]]stag ste/_gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/_'di ltar slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/_/dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang /_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lnga brgya 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]tsam dang /_dge bsnyen pha dang /_dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang /_chos mthong ba sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_tshad med grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin rab 
[\[2a.2\]]tu thob pa/_stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spyod yul can/_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/_bstan pa zad 
[\[2a.3\]]mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/_mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/_mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams ba/_mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/_le lo [{]myed [,]med [}]cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_lus dang 
[\[2a.4\]]srog la [{]myi [,]mi [}]lta ba/_tshul 'chos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_kha gsag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_grags pa dang /_khe dang bkur sti'i sems [{]myed [,]med [}]ba/_zang zing [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos ston pa/_chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa chen po thob pa/_yid yongs 
[\[2a.5\]]su zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad ba/_las dang nyon mongs pa dang /_phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom ba/_pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 
[\[2a.6\]]thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/_chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/_bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/_thog mar smra ba/_khro gnyer [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/_pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/_spobs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]chod pa/_'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa dang ldan pa/_bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan 
[\[2b.2\]]pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam dang /_sgra brnyan dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor dang /_nam mkha' dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_sprul pa dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/_
[\[2b.3\]]sems yongs su zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang /_shes pa phra ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad la sdang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_bzod pa rlabs po che 
[\[2b.4\]]dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/_rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/_chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/_las dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_
[\[2b.5\]]lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/_brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa la zhugs pa/_lta ba dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/_kun tu sbyor ba thams 
[\[2b.6\]]cad spangs pa/_las dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/_bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa/_chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 'jigs pa 
[\[2b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]chad par mngon du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa/_sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi 
[\[3a.2\]]bar bya ba la mkhas pa/_ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/_yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[3a.3\]]chen po bzang skyong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen byin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[3a.4\]]ded dpon dam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bus byin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyob sbed dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu bdag lha dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos 
[\[3a.5\]]byin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang po'i stobs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo 
[\[3a.6\]]gros 'phel ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod mthong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib med blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[3a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu sbyor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gtong brtson pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying 
[\[3b.2\]]po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dpe med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[3b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin 
[\[3b.4\]]chen phyag rgya dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[3b.5\]]dpa' chen po rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri bo'i zom dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_gzhan yang bye ba khrag 
[\[3b.6\]]khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas/_sku drang por bsrangs te/_dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas/_skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/der bzhugs nas ting nge 
[\[3b.7\]]'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang /_khongs su chud pa dang /_rjes su 'brang ba dang /_'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]de las bzhengs te/_'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so/_/de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od gzer rab tu bkye ste/_de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan 
[\[4a.2\]]pa gnyis las 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/zhabs kyi long bu gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/
[\[4a.3\]]zhabs byin pa gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/zhabs pus mo gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/zhabs brla gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/sku 
[\[4a.4\]]sta zur gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo /_/sku rtsib logs gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/thugs ka'i 
[\[4a.5\]]skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo /_/phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/phyag lag ngar gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung 
[\[4a.6\]]byung ngo /_/sku phrag pa gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/mgur nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo /_/tshems mche ba bzhi las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/tshems 
[\[4a.7\]]bzhi bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/spyan gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/snyan gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/shangs kyi sbubs 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo /_/steng gi spyi gtsug nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo /_/zhal gyi sgo nas 
[\[4b.2\]]kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ste/_'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi 
[\[4b.3\]]khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab 
[\[4b.4\]]par byas so/_/byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/shar lho'i phyogs 
[\[4b.5\]]mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi 
[\[4b.6\]]khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par 
[\[4b.7\]]byas so/_/sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /_'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od gzer rab tu dgye 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]ba mdzad de/_'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/lho phyogs su 'jig 
[\[5a.2\]]rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/
[\[5a.3\]]byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig 
[\[5a.4\]]rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba 
[\[5a.5\]]chen pos khyab par byas so/_/steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /_'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[5a.6\]]pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenagyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[5a.7\]]snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/byang phyogs su 'jig 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/shar phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[5b.2\]]bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gAng ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad 
[\[5b.3\]]do/_/'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /_'od des 
[\[5b.4\]]gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyurato/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas/_ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags 
[\[5b.5\]]kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas/_zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/_'od gzer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi 
[\[5b.6\]]mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/_sna tshogs su 'dug pa/_blta na sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_kha dog bzang ba/_dri zhim pa/_'jam pa/_ka tsa lin ti ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/_pad mo de dag la yang de bzhin 
[\[5b.7\]]gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad de/_de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing /_de dag tu byon nas/_'di lta ste/_
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de dag lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing /_de dag tu byon nas/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos 
[\[6a.2\]]bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de dag nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing /_de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten 
[\[6a.3\]]gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing /_de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de dag byang shar [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing 
[\[6a.4\]]de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de dag shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing /_de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[6a.5\]]drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de dag lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di 
[\[6a.6\]]nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de dag nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de dag 'og gi phyogs 
[\[6a.7\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de dag steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 
[\[6b.2\]]gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/_sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/_
[\[6b.3\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_g.yos so/_rab tu g.yos so/_kun tu g.yos so/_/'gul to/_rab tu 'gul to/_kun tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go_/rab tu ldeg go_/kun tu ldeg go_/chem chem/_rab tu chem 
[\[6b.4\]]chem/_kun tu chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig_/rab tu shig shig_/kun tu shig shig go_/mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/_dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/_dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad 
[\[6b.5\]]la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par gyur to/_de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi khom pa dang /_
[\[6b.6\]]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par lhung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur te/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtsho ma dang /_dga' ldan 
[\[6b.7\]]dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/de nas lha de dag dang /_mi de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na bder dong zhing phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[7a.2\]]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang 
[\[7a.3\]]lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas mi de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang 
[\[7a.4\]]rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[7a.5\]]rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[7a.6\]]rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas mi de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe 
[\[7a.7\]]rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_nub phyogs 
[\[7b.2\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can de dag 
[\[7b.3\]]thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas mi de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams 
[\[7b.4\]]bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/_zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[7b.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song 
[\[7b.6\]]gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas mi de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_
[\[7b.7\]]mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur 
[\[8a.2\]]to/_/de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang 
[\[8a.3\]]rgyun chad/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 
[\[8a.4\]]gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing 
[\[8a.5\]]phyin nas/_zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[8a.6\]]khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lhar 
[\[8a.7\]]skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/_zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[8b.2\]]rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams 
[\[8b.3\]]cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_
[\[8b.4\]]nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran bar gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[8b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/_zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig 
[\[8b.6\]]yud tsam thang cig la/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/_
[\[8b.7\]]mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 
[\[9a.2\]]bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_
[\[9a.3\]]steng gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par 
[\[9a.4\]]gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam bar skyes so/_/de nas mi de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran 
[\[9a.5\]]nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/_
[\[9a.6\]]zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 
[\[9a.7\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas mi de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba thob par gyur 
[\[9b.2\]]ba de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[9b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/_/'on 
[\[9b.4\]]pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/_/smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/_/sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems thob par gyur to/_/gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to/_/dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par 
[\[9b.5\]]gyur to/_/bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to/_/skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to/_/nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur to/_/lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to/_/ngal ba 
[\[9b.6\]]rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang /_'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang /_'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang sems can 
[\[9b.7\]]thams cad la dper na/_pha dang ma dang phu nu dang /_sring mo dang /_mdza' ba dang /_gnyen pa dang /_grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]gtsang ba dang /_nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/_dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta 
[\[10a.2\]]bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/_'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o/_dul ba ni dge ba'o/_/sdom pa ni dge ba'o/_/bden pa ni dge ba'o/_bag byed pa ni dge ba'o/_byams pa ni dge 
[\[10a.3\]]ba'o/_/snying rje ni dge ba'o/_srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang /_kye ma sems can 'di dag 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o/_/
[\[10a.4\]]dul ba ni dge ba'o/_/zhi ba ni dge ba'o sdom pa ni dge ba'o/_/bden pa ni dge ba'o/_bag byed pa ni dge ba'o/_/byams pa ni dge ba'o/_/snying rje ni dge ba'o/_/tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa ni dge ba'o/_/srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes pa'i 
[\[10a.5\]]shes rab de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar to zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/_'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am/_zla ba nya'i zla 
[\[10a.6\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/_khor yug dang bcas pa/_lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/_dbang po dang bcas pa/_dbang byed dang bcas pa/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa gtsang ma'i 
[\[10a.7\]]gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/_'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang /_sku 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing /_lham me lhan ne/_lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me 
[\[10b.2\]]lhan ne/_lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/_lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten 
[\[10b.3\]]gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne/_lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang sku 
[\[10b.4\]]mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing /_lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes 
[\[10b.5\]]shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/_lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du 
[\[10b.6\]]lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung 
[\[10b.7\]]gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po ri 
[\[11a.2\]]rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing /_lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni/_mdzes shing lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste 
[\[11a.3\]]dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_dbang po dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas 
[\[11a.4\]]pa dang /_gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/_zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang /_'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/_stong gsum gyi 
[\[11a.5\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_tshangs ris dang /_
[\[11a.6\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_dga' ldan dang /_mtshe ma dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[11a.7\]]sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/_dga' zhing spro ba dang /_yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas/_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang /_lha rdzas u dpal dang /_pad+mo dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da ri ka dang /_na li na dang /_so'u gan d+hi dang /_lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_
[\[11b.2\]]lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_byug spos 
[\[11b.3\]]dang /_u dpal dang /_pad+mo dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da ri ka dang /_na li na dang /_so'u gan d+hi dang /_me tog ke sa ra dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor 
[\[11b.4\]]to/_/mngon par gtor to/_/rab tu gtor to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_'dul ba dang /_snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /_me tog chu las skyes pa dang /_thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/_
[\[11b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/_/me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[11b.6\]]ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du 
[\[11b.7\]]gnas par gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang /_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to/_/mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to/_/rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to/_/me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang /_shin tu mdzes shing lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger gyur te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[12a.2\]]gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_
[\[12a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[12a.4\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing 
[\[12a.5\]]gsal bar gyur to/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[12a.6\]]snyed kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/'og 
[\[12a.7\]]gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]bar gyur to/_/de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/'dzam bu'i 
[\[12b.2\]]gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/_nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos 
[\[12b.3\]]ston to snyam mo/_/shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/
[\[12b.4\]]byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 
[\[12b.5\]]rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin 
[\[12b.6\]]gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes 
[\[12b.7\]]pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_
[\[13a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[13a.3\]]bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos 
[\[13a.4\]]ston to snyam mo/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/tshangs pa kun 
[\[13a.5\]]'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[13a.6\]]pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_
[\[13a.7\]]'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/chung snang gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[13b.2\]]pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi 
[\[13b.3\]]mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to 
[\[13b.4\]]snyam mo/_/chung dge'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/tshad med dge ba'i 
[\[13b.5\]]lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin 
[\[13b.6\]]gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi 
[\[13b.7\]]shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/chung che'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_
[\[14a.2\]]'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems 
[\[14a.3\]]par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[14a.4\]]pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun 
[\[14a.5\]]na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs 
[\[14a.6\]]shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to 
[\[14a.7\]]snyam mo/_/'og min gyi lha rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]de bzhin du stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]thams cad dang /_lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs 
[\[14b.2\]]shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang /_lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[14b.3\]]bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]thams cad dang /_lha thams cad kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa mthong nas/_'di 
[\[14b.4\]]snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/_'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/_yang 'od 
[\[14b.5\]]des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang 
[\[14b.6\]]rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams 
[\[14b.7\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[15a.2\]]kyang /_rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams 
[\[15a.3\]]cad kyis/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong 
[\[15a.4\]]bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[15a.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[15a.6\]]khams 'di na/_sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 
[\[15a.7\]]dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /_stong gsum gyi 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar 
[\[15b.2\]]gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[15b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang 
[\[15b.4\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang 
[\[15b.5\]]thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[15b.6\]]kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[15b.7\]]klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]rgyas shAkya thub pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi/_stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[16a.2\]]gyi khams 'di na/_sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[16a.3\]]rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 
[\[16a.4\]]'khod pa de dag gis kyang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 
[\[16a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_shar lho'i phyogs 
[\[16a.6\]]mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur 
[\[16a.7\]]to/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[16b.2\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[16b.3\]]sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'iklung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 'khod 
[\[16b.4\]]pa de dag gis kyang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang 
[\[16b.5\]]chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams 
[\[16b.6\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/_/nub 
[\[16b.7\]]byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can 
[\[17a.2\]]gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po 
[\[17a.3\]]mthong bar gyur to/_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[17a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang ci snyed cig yod pa de dag 
[\[17a.5\]]thams cad kyis/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/_/steng 
[\[17a.6\]]gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[17a.7\]]shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa 
[\[17b.2\]]mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi 
[\[17b.3\]]shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[17b.4\]]sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad 
[\[17b.5\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[17b.6\]]rigs kyi bu 'di ni/_nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes 
[\[17b.7\]]bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/_
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[18a.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang /_phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[18a.3\]]bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la 
[\[18a.4\]]bab par shes na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la/_pad+mo 
[\[18a.5\]]rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/
[\[18a.6\]]nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig 
[\[18a.7\]]rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 
[\[18b.2\]]'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug 
[\[18b.3\]]spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur bstir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 
[\[18b.4\]]'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos 
[\[18b.5\]]phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[18b.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/_zhes 'dri ste pad+mo gser gyi 
[\[18b.7\]]mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[19a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid 
[\[19a.3\]]brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[19a.4\]]byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas 
[\[19a.5\]]so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod pa byas so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_/de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das 
[\[19a.6\]]pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[19a.7\]]po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[19b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de 
[\[19b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[19b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[19b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te 
[\[19b.6\]]de 'dra 'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[19b.7\]]ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang /_phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 
[\[20a.2\]]mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[20a.3\]]sangs rgyas mya ngan [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la/_pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[20a.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod 
[\[20a.5\]]dam zhes kyang zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_
[\[20a.6\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_
[\[20a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur bstir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems 
[\[20b.2\]]dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[20b.3\]]la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[20b.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang /_dgyes par spyod dam/_zhes 'dri 
[\[20b.5\]]ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/
[\[20b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[20b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[21a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[21a.3\]]shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur bstir byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod pa byas so/_/de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya 
[\[21a.4\]]ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag 
[\[21a.5\]]par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros shes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de 
[\[21a.6\]]mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste/_phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 
[\[21a.7\]]'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[21b.2\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[21b.3\]]rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 
[\[21b.4\]]'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen 
[\[21b.5\]]bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/_
[\[21b.6\]]de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[21b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/_pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_
[\[22a.2\]]bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par 
[\[22a.3\]]gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag 
[\[22a.4\]]blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs 
[\[22a.5\]]shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang /_bdug spos dang phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang phye ma dang /_na bza' dang rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing byang 
[\[22a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[22a.7\]]la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang /_dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma 
[\[22b.2\]]stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[22b.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag 
[\[22b.4\]]gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/_/
[\[22b.5\]]chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i 
[\[22b.6\]]gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur bstir byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod pa byas so/_/
[\[22b.7\]]de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[23a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[23a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od 
[\[23a.4\]]chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[23a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_
[\[23a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes 
[\[23a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i 
[\[23b\]]
