[\[23b.1\]]dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[23b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/_de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[23b.3\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos 
[\[23b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/_pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[23b.5\]]rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[23b.6\]]zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal 
[\[23b.7\]]bas byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_
[\[24a.2\]]spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing byang chub 
[\[24a.3\]]sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[24a.4\]]gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[24a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po/_/bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_
[\[24a.6\]]pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom 
[\[24a.7\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di 
[\[24b.2\]]nyid brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[24b.3\]]byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir 
[\[24b.4\]]byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod pa byas so/_/de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[24b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par 
[\[24b.6\]]ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na 
[\[24b.7\]]chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[25a.2\]]sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[25a.3\]]chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_
[\[25a.4\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu 
[\[25a.5\]]yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 
[\[25a.6\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur 
[\[25a.7\]]ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[25b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur 
[\[25b.3\]]te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde'am/_sku nyams 
[\[25b.4\]]dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis 
[\[25b.5\]]der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/_pad+mo 
[\[25b.6\]]gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_byang shar 
[\[25b.7\]]gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang byug pa dang /_phye ma dang na bza' dang /_rgyan dang gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]dang bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na 
[\[26a.2\]]ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi pos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/_
[\[26a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma 
[\[26a.4\]]mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/_zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[26a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub 
[\[26a.6\]]pas/_pad+mo de dag bzhes nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de 
[\[26a.7\]]dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis 
[\[26b.2\]]kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_bkur bstir byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod par byas so/_/de nas shar lho'i 
[\[26b.3\]]phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[26b.4\]]rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[26b.5\]]dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[26b.6\]]sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 
[\[26b.7\]]'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig 
[\[27a.2\]]rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang 
[\[27a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[27a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[27a.5\]]sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_
[\[27a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/_de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/_
[\[27a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la/_pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[27b.2\]]la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der 
[\[27b.3\]]skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[27b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de las/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 
[\[27b.5\]]'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang phreng ba dang /_byug pa 
[\[27b.6\]]dang phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur bstir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen 
[\[27b.7\]]pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[28a.2\]]sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/_zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab 
[\[28a.3\]]ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[28a.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[28a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di 
[\[28a.6\]]nyid brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /_rab 
[\[28a.7\]]tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]stir byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod pa byas so/_/de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[28b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag 
[\[28b.3\]]par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa 
[\[28b.4\]]de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[28b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu 
[\[28b.6\]]gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/_ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[28b.7\]]chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 
[\[29a.2\]]'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces 
[\[29a.3\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen 
[\[29a.4\]]bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu 
[\[29a.5\]]thob pa/_de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/_
[\[29a.6\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la/_pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las 
[\[29a.7\]]byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub 
[\[29b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[29b.3\]]rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_
[\[29b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang byug pa dang /_phye ma dang na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_
[\[29b.5\]]gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[29b.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[29b.7\]]chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/_zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom 
[\[30a.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[30a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[30a.4\]]de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams 
[\[30a.5\]]te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung 
[\[30a.6\]]ba dang /_khyi'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur bstir 
[\[30a.7\]]byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod pa byas so/_de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/
[\[30b.2\]]de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_
[\[30b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs 
[\[30b.4\]]dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_
[\[30b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar 
[\[30b.6\]]lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 
[\[30b.7\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[31a.2\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab 
[\[31a.3\]]tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi 
[\[31a.4\]]mjed der song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan 
[\[31a.5\]]pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo 
[\[31a.6\]]bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu 
[\[31a.7\]]bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_gdugs dam pa de 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas 
[\[31b.2\]]mi snang bar gyur nas/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[31b.3\]]rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom 
[\[31b.4\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig 
[\[31b.5\]]tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa 
[\[31b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 
[\[31b.7\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]rgyas shAkya thub pas/_pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba 
[\[32a.2\]]der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de 
[\[32a.3\]]sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug 
[\[32a.4\]]pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod pa byas 
[\[32a.5\]]so/_/de nas 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal 
[\[32a.6\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[32a.7\]]dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta 
[\[32b.2\]]bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[32b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig 
[\[32b.4\]]rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/_shes 
[\[32b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i 
[\[32b.6\]]dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi 
[\[32b.7\]]zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]dbang rab tu thob pa/_de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[33a.2\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa la/_pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das 
[\[33a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang 
[\[33a.4\]]dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re 
[\[33a.5\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal de las/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems 
[\[33a.6\]]dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing /_'tsho skyong ba de dag 
[\[33a.7\]]thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_
[\[33b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[33b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo 
[\[33b.4\]]gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[33b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/_pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[33b.6\]]sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 
[\[33b.7\]]'di nyid brtsams te chos ston/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[34a.2\]]shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_bkur stir byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod pa byas so/_/de nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi ya rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams mdangs dga' ba 
[\[34a.3\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[34a.4\]]nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[34a.5\]]sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[34a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' 
[\[34a.7\]]ba 'di ci'i rgyu/_ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[34b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[34b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang /_'jig rten gyi 
[\[34b.4\]]khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang 
[\[34b.5\]]phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/_de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[34b.6\]]pa dga' ba'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis/_byang chub 
[\[34b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pa la/_pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus 
[\[35a.2\]]shig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dga' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub 
[\[35a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de las/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub 
[\[35a.4\]]sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs 
[\[35a.5\]]shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang byug ba dang /_phye ma dang na bza' dang /_rgyan dang gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing byang chub 
[\[35a.6\]]sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te 
[\[35a.7\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal/_
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/_zhes 'dri ste/_pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[35b.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag 
[\[35b.3\]]bzhes nas/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par 
[\[35b.4\]]khyab par gyur te/_pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te/_chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[35b.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[35b.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/phu dud du byas so/_/mchod pa byas so/_/de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_stong gsum gyi/_stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[35b.7\]]gyi khams 'di rin po che'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur te/_me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis kun tu gang ba dang /_dar gyi lda ldi dang /_chun po kun nas bres pa dang /_snod sna tshogs nas bdug spos sna tshogs 'thul ba dang /_
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]dpag bsam gyi shing rgyan dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs kyis yal ga'i rtse mo g.yur za ba dang /_me tog gi shing dang /_'bras bu'i shing dang /_spos kyi shing dang /_phreng ba'i shing dang /_phye ma'i shing dang /_bdug spos kyi shing sna 
[\[36a.2\]]tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[36a.3\]]'dug pa dang /_lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gzi brjid chen po dag 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo can bzhin du gyur to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[36a.4\]]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gsum pa/_/de'i tshe de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_
[\[36a.5\]]bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/_lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin dang bcas pa mang po tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[36a.6\]]mang po de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs 
[\[36a.7\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[36b.2\]]stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas pa med pa'i tshul du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sbyin pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_yongs su len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_yongs su 
[\[36b.3\]]gtong ba med pa'i tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/ltung ba dang mi ltung ba bya ba med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'khrug pa med pa'i phyir/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[36b.4\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus nyam pa med pa'i phyir/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'khrug pa med cing yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[36b.5\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_
[\[36b.6\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_yang dag par spong ba mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[36b.7\]]pa'i phyir/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_dbang po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[37a.2\]]bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_stobs mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[37a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_byang chub kyi yan lag mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[37a.4\]]pa la gnas te/_lam mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_stong pa nyid mi 
[\[37a.5\]]dmigs pa'i phyir/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_mtshan ma med pa mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir/_mtshan ma 
[\[37a.6\]]med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[37a.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_bsam gtan mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[37b.2\]]pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_gzugs med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha 
[\[37b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam par thar pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i phyir/_rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_mthar gyis gnas 
[\[37b.4\]]pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_mngon par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[37b.5\]]phyir/_mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_'du shes dgu bsgom par bya ste/_'di ltar rnam par bam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_
[\[37b.6\]]rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_'bu can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_'bu can gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[37b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam par rnags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam par dmar ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_
[\[38a.2\]]rnam par sngos pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam par zos pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rnam par 
[\[38a.3\]]zos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam par 'thor ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[38a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rus pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rus pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[38a.5\]]gnas te/_rnam par tshig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_mi mthun pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_zas 
[\[38a.6\]]la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[38a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]gnas te/_dge 'dun mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_tshul khrims mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_tshul khrims rjes su 
[\[38b.2\]]dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_gtong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[38b.3\]]dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_lha mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_dbugs phyi nang 
[\[38b.4\]]du rgyu ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_skye ba rjes su dran pa 
[\[38b.5\]]bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_'chi ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_'chi ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[38b.6\]]pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_lus mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_mi rtag pa mi 
[\[38b.7\]]dmigs pa'i phyir/_mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_bdag med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_bdag med pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[39a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_mi sdug pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[39a.3\]]la gnas te/_'chi ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_dga' bar mi bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_
[\[39a.4\]]'jig rten thams cad la dga' bar mi bya ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_yid brtan du mi rung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_'jig rten thams 
[\[39a.5\]]cad la yid brtan du mi rung ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_sdug bsngal shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_
[\[39a.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_kun 'byung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_kun 'byung ba shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[39a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_'gog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_'gog pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_lam mi dmigs pa'i phyir 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]lam shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_zad pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[39b.2\]]dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_mi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_mi skye ba shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_chos mi dmigs 
[\[39b.3\]]pa'i phyir/_chos shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_gnyis su med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_gnyis su med pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha 
[\[39b.4\]]ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_kun rdzob mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_kun rdzob shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes 
[\[39b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_'dris pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_'dris pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sgra ji bzhin mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[39b.6\]]phyir/_sgra ji bzhin shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rnam par rtog pa dang 
[\[39b.7\]]bcas rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa tsam mi dmigs 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam par 
[\[40a.2\]]rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[40a.3\]]pa la gnas te/_yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
