[\[61a.5\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[61a.6\]]gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul ba rnam pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 
[\[61a.7\]]bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis blta bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang /_
[\[61b.2\]]ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[61b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis blta bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[61b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan 
[\[61b.5\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[61b.6\]]ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag phyogs bcu kun tu chos gang ston pa de thams cad dran pa'i stobs dang /_shugs gcad du [{]myi [,]mi [}]chod pas yang dag par gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[61b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du de thams cad chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]za bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[62a.2\]]bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi 
[\[62a.3\]]dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la phab pa bstan pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma thos pa gang ji bstan kyang rung ste/_
[\[62a.4\]]de dag thams cad thos par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_bklag par 'dod pa dang /_yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher bstan 
[\[62a.5\]]par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag par bstan par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 
[\[62a.6\]]gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_bklag par 'dod pa dang /_yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_
[\[62a.7\]]gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /_de la yang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho phyogs su sangs rgyas 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_bklag par 'dod pa dang /_yongs su 
[\[62b.2\]]chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /_de la yang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[62b.3\]]chen po nub phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_
[\[62b.4\]]bklag par 'dod pa dang /_yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /_de la yang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[62b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_
[\[62b.6\]]bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_bklag par 'dod pa dang /_yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /_de la yang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 
[\[62b.7\]]bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_bklag par 'dod pa dang /_yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /_de la yang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas/_
[\[63a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ji yang 
[\[63a.3\]]rung ste/_de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_bklag par 'dod pa dang /_yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /_de 
[\[63a.4\]]la yang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /_
[\[63a.5\]]gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_bklag par 'dod pa dang /_yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan la yang 
[\[63a.6\]]rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /_de la yang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su sangs 
[\[63a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_bklag par 'dod pa dang /_
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /_de la yang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[63b.2\]]po 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_bklag par 'dod 
[\[63b.3\]]pa dang /_yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /_de la yang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[63b.4\]]dpa' chen po steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_
[\[63b.5\]]bklag par 'dod pa dang /_yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /_de la yang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[63b.6\]]ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa smag gis khyab pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar gzi brjid che la/_
[\[63b.7\]]'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /_lham mer [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhan ner [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhang nger [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho phyogs 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/_smag gis khyab pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /_'di ltar gzi brjid che la/_'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /_
[\[64a.2\]]lham myer [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhan ner [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhang nger [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung 
[\[64a.3\]]gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/_smag gis khyab pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /_'di ltar gzi brjid che la/_'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /_lham myer [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung lhan ner [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhang nger [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba de lta bu 
[\[64a.4\]]thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/_smag 
[\[64a.5\]]gis khyab pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /_'di ltar gzi brjid che la/_'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /_lham myer [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhan ner [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhang nger [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[64a.6\]]tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/_smag gis khyab pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul 
[\[64a.7\]]che zhing /_'di ltar gzi brjid che la/_'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /_lham myer [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhan ner [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhang nger [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]dpa' chen po shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/_smag gis khyab pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /_'di ltar gzi brjid che la/_'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis 
[\[64b.2\]]kyang /_lham myer [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhan ner mi rung /_lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[64b.3\]]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/_smag gis khyab pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /_'di ltar gzi brjid che la/_'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /_lham myer [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhan ner mi rung /_
[\[64b.4\]]lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 
[\[64b.5\]]na/_mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/_smag gis khyab pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /_'di ltar gzi brjid che la/_'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /_lham myer mi rung /_lhan ner mi rung /_lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang 
[\[64b.6\]]bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/_smag gis khyab 
[\[64b.7\]]pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /_'di ltar gzi brjid che la/_'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /_lham mer mi rung /_lhan ner mi rung /_lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/_smag gis khyab pa/_nyi ma dang zla ba 'di 
[\[65a.2\]]ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /_'di ltar gzi brjid che la/_'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /_lham mer [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung /_lhan ner mi rung /_lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_
[\[65a.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis mi thos pa de lta 
[\[65a.4\]]bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 
[\[65a.5\]]bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis mi thos pa de lta 
[\[65a.6\]]bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[65a.7\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[65b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu/_
[\[65b.3\]]sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu 
[\[65b.5\]]sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[65b.6\]]dpa' chen po shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag 
[\[65b.7\]]thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]po lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems 
[\[66a.2\]]can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[66a.3\]]chen po nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams 
[\[66a.4\]]cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la da god par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'og gi 
[\[66a.5\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[66a.6\]]dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po steng gi phyogs kyi 
[\[66a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis/_sangs 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[66b.2\]]dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams 
[\[66b.3\]]dran pa thob pa dang /_gos [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams gos thob pa dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /_nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_btson ra dang khri mon na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_bdag gi mthus dga' 
[\[66b.4\]]dgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can long ba ji 
[\[66b.5\]]snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus/_mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /_gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom 
[\[66b.6\]]thob pa dang /_nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_btson ra dang /_khri mon na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_bdag gi mthus dga' dgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[66b.7\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /_gos [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams gos thob pa dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /_nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_btson ra dang khri mon na 
[\[67a.2\]]'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang bdag gi mthus dga' dgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[67a.3\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /_gos med pa rnams gos thob 
[\[67a.4\]]pa dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /_nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_btson ra dang khri mon na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang bdag gi mthus dga' dgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na yang /_
[\[67a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag 
[\[67a.6\]]thams cad bdag gi mthus [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /_gos [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams gos thob pa dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /_nad pa 
[\[67a.7\]]rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_btson ra dang khri mon na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_bdag gi mthus dga' dgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa 
[\[67b.2\]]rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /_gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_btson ra dang khri mon na 'khod pa rnams 
[\[67b.3\]]bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_bdag gi mthus dga' dgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten 
[\[67b.4\]]gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /_gos med pa 
[\[67b.5\]]rnams gos thob pa dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /_nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_btson ra dang khri mon na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_bdag gi mthus dga' dgur 'dod du yod par bya'o/_/
[\[67b.6\]]snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can long ba ji snyed 
[\[67b.7\]]cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /_gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /_
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_btson ra dang khri mon na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_bdag gi mthus dga' dgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_
[\[68a.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa rnams rna 
[\[68a.3\]]bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /_gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /_nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_btson ra dang khri mon na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 
[\[68a.4\]]'phrul dang /_bdag gi mthus dga' dgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[68a.5\]]dag na/_sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /_gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /_bkres pa dang skom pa rnams 
[\[68a.6\]]zas dang skom thob pa dang /_nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_btson ra dang khri mon na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /_bdag gi mthus dga' dgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[68a.7\]]ji ltar na phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can mi khom pa dang /_ngan song du ltung ba sems can dmyal ba pa'am/_byol song gi skye gnas pa'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa ji snyed cig yod pa 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus de nas shi 'phos nas/_mi'i lus thob par bya snyam ste/_sems can de dag thams cad tshul khrims la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_shes rab la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_rnam 
[\[68b.2\]]par grol ba la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 
[\[68b.3\]]dgod par 'dod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i byang 
[\[68b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam la bslab par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[68b.5\]]gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang /_tshul rnam par dag pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las dang /_gsung gi phrin las dang /_thugs kyi phrin las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yongs su dag pa la bslab par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[68b.6\]]phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag gi glang po chen po'i lta stangs kyis bltas te/_
[\[68b.7\]]sems can rnams la thogs pa med par chos bstan par 'gyur/_ji ltar na bdag seng ge chen po'i rnam par bsgyings pas rnam par bsgying par 'gyur/_ji ltar na bdag gis don yod pa'i rnam par gnan pas rnam par gnon par bya/_ji ltar na 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bdag sa chen po la sor bzhi tsam gyis rkang pas mi reg par 'gro bar 'gyur/_ji ltar na bdag gis pad+mo lo ma stong dang ldan pa la rkang pa gnyis kyi mthil bzhag cing rkang pa'i 'og na gnas pa'i srog chags rnams la mi gnod 
[\[69a.2\]]par 'gro bar bya/_ji ltar na bdag rkang pa'i mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis kyis sa chen po la rnam par bris te 'gro bar 'gyur/_ji ltar na bdag sa chen po la 'khor kun tu 'khor lo tsam gyi khyon yongs su bskor cing 'chags na 
[\[69a.3\]]'chag par 'gyur/_ji ltar na bdag sa chen po thams cad du rgyu zhing song yang sa'i rdul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]gos par 'gyur/_ji ltar na bdag dpag tshad gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bzhi 'am/_lnga 'am bcu 'am/_nyi shu 'am/_sum cu 'am/_bzhi 
[\[69a.4\]]bcu 'am/_lnga bcu 'am/_dpag tshad brgya 'am/_dpag tshad stong ngam/_dpag tshad brgya phrag stong ngam/_dpag tshad bye ba 'am/_dpag tshad bye ba brgya 'am/_dpag tshad bye ba stong ngam/_dpag tshad bye ba brgya phrag stong ngam/_dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[69a.5\]]gam/_dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya 'am/_dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig stong ngam/_dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/_dpag tshad tshad med pa 'am/_grangs med pa 'am/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'am/_mtshungs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_
[\[69a.6\]]mtha' yas pa 'am/_kun tu mtha' yas pa 'am/_gzhal du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu rgyus te song yang /_lus dang sems la dub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[69a.7\]]pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag gis rkang pa'i mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]ldan pa gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong bkye ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]khom pa dang /_ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas nas/_sems can thams cad bde bar bya bar 'gyur snyam na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab 
[\[69b.2\]]par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa 
[\[69b.3\]]gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba dang /_kun 
[\[69b.4\]]snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_'og min gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[69b.5\]]brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_snying po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar bya snyam na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[69b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug pa'i tshe/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_mtshe ma'i lha dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha dang /_
[\[69b.7\]]'phrul dga'i lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha dang /_snang ba'i lha dang /_chung snang gi lha dang /_tshad med snang ba'i lha dang /_kun 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]snang dang ba'i lha dang /_dge ba'i lha dang chung dge'i lha dang /_tshad med dge ba'i lha dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha dang /_che ba'i lha dang /_chung che'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]tshe ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i 
[\[70a.2\]]lha dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /_shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams stan 'ding bar 'gyur snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[70a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag snying po byang chub la 'dug ste/_mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa'i lag gis sa chen po la brdabs nas/_nag po'i phyogs bdud 'khor dang 
[\[70a.4\]]bcas pa shin tu pham par bya snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su 
[\[70a.5\]]brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba'i sa'i phyogs de dag rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'dug par 'gyur snyam na yang /_
[\[70a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag nyi ma gang 
[\[70a.7\]]la mngon par byung ba de nyid kyi nyi ma la nag po'i phyogs 'khor dang bcas pa pham par bya ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya/_mngon par sangs rgyas nas ni ji ltar nyi ma de nyid la chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]bskor bar bya/_'khor lo bskor nas ni ji ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems can rnams rdul dang bral te/_dri ma dang bral nas chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par bya/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems can rnams ni ji ltar nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[70b.2\]]par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar bya/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ni ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 
[\[70b.3\]]bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[70b.4\]]sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur/_chos bstan pa gcig gis stan gcig pa'i dgra bcom pa ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang 
[\[70b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur/_tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur/_'od dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni phun sum tshogs par 'gyur snyam na yang /_shes 
[\[70b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[70b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi sgra yang mi grag par bya snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[71a.2\]]sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o/_/dul ba ni dge ba'o/_/sdom pa ni dge ba'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni dge ba'o/_/srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la 'tshe ba med pa ni dge ba'o/_
[\[71a.3\]]zhes bya bar shes pa'i shes rab de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur snyam na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[71a.4\]]sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang dam pa'i chos nub ces bya ba'i sgra yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]grag par 'gyur snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[71a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag gi [{]mying [,]ming [}]thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can mang po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[71a.6\]]pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_yon tan 'di dag sgrub par 
[\[71a.7\]]gyur pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po chen po bzhi yang gang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po chen po rnams kyis phul pa'i lhung bzed rnams bdag cag gis kyang /_'di la dbul bar bya'o zhes dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag gis 'di 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]la rim gro dang /_phu dud du bya'o zhes sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_
[\[71b.2\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar lha ma yin gyi ris rnams ni 'grib par 'gyur/_lha'i ris rnams ni 'phel bar 'gyur te/_'di mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don tu/_
[\[71b.3\]]bdag cag gis gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 
[\[71b.4\]]kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 
[\[71b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/'og min gyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba 
[\[71b.6\]]de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang bdag cag ni sems can chen po 'di'i pha dang /_ma dang /_phu nu dang /_sring mo dang /_chung ma dang bu dang bu mo dang /_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_gnyen 
[\[71b.7\]]bshes dang /_grogs po dang /_bshes par 'gyur ro snyam ste dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la btsun mo'i 'khor dbul lo zhes rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_mtshe ma'i lha dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha dang /_'phrul dga'i lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor 
[\[72a.2\]]gyi lha dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha dang /_snang ba'i lha dang /_chung snang gi lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /_dge ba'i lha dang /_chung dge'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha dang /_che ba'i lha dang /_chung 
[\[72a.3\]]che'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha dang /_shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur te/_de ni sems can rnams byang chub la 
[\[72a.4\]]dgod pa'i phyir tshangs par spyod pa yin te/_'du ba'i chos rnams kyis yongs su 'du ba ma yin no/_/de 'di ltar smon te/_bdag gis sems dang po bskyed nas tshangs par spyad de/_tshangs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod 
[\[72a.5\]]pa la bsten pa ni/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba la yang bar du gcod na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta la ci smos/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni mngon par byung nas tshangs par spyad de/_bla na 
[\[72a.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'i/_tshangs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po lnga pa/_/
[\[72a.7\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ci lags bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la pha dang ma dang /_mchis brang dang /_bu dang bu 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]mo gdon mi 'tshal bar 'tshal lam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la la ni pha dang ma gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za bar dgos kyi/_bu dang bu mo dang /_chung ma [{]myi [,]mi [}]dgos so/_/la la la ni 
[\[72b.2\]]pha dang ma dang chung ma dang /_bu dang bu mo dag kyang gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za bar dgos so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni sems dang po bskyed phyin cad/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par len te/_bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[72b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du gzhon nur gyur par 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_'dod pa'i yon 
[\[72b.4\]]tan lnga la yongs su spyad de/_chung ma'i 'khor gyi nang nas mngon par byung nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[72b.5\]]zab mo la rnam par spyod pa/_'dod pa'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba la la ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_'dod pa'i yon tan la yongs su spyod pa yang ston te/_nyams kyis yongs su spyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu 
[\[72b.6\]]ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa/_sgyu ma'i sngags dang /_sbyor thabs kyi tshul la shin tu bslabs pa de lta bu zhig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mngon par sprul te/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag la bdag nyid rtse zhing dga' ba dang 
[\[72b.7\]]yongs su spyod par bstan na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang /_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yongs su spyod pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta bu ma mchis so/_/
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i sgyu ma la shin tu bslabs pa/_chos nyid sgyu ma lta bus rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/_nyon 
[\[73a.2\]]mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dag kyang 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_snying rje chen po'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yongs su spyod pa yang ston te/_de dag de dang 'grogs pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_des 'go bar 'gyur 
[\[73a.3\]]ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rnam grangs du mas 'dod pa rnams la skyon du rjod de/_'dod pa rnams ni kun nas 'bar ba'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni rab tu smad pa'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni gsod 
[\[73a.4\]]pa'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni dgra'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni phyir rgol ba'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni rtswa'i sgron ma lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni kim pa ka'i 'bras bu lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni ral gyi'i so lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni [{]mye [,]me [}]mdag 
[\[73a.5\]]spungs pa lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni dug gi lo ma lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni mchil pa lta bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtsang ba'i rlubs lta bu'o/_/zhes de ltar sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dod pa yongs su 
[\[73a.6\]]shes kyang sems can thabs mkhas pa ma yin pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las skyo bar bya ba dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang dbral ba'i phyir/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar ston te/_de dag gis myos par 'gyur 
[\[73a.7\]]ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_bag [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'dod pa'i rgyu dang /_'dod pa'i gzhis sdig to'i las byed par 'gyur ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[73b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab 
[\[73b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[73b.4\]]mthong ngo /_/spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor

[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]do/_stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin/_'du shes las gud na yang stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so/_/stong pa nyid kyis 'du

[\[74a.3\]]shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub ces bya ba 'di yang [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di yang [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_/stong pa nyid ces

[\[74a.7\]]'phel ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'grib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rnam par byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang skye ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'gag pa yang dag par rjes 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gnas pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'phel ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'grib pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/kun nas nyon mongs pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rnam par byang ba yang

[\[74b.4\]]du byung ba'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang dag pa ma yin pa las/_yongs su brtags pas tha snyad du brjod do/_/tha snyad kyi rgyus mngon par zhen par gyur pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[74b.5\]]chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa med pas rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mngon par zhen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]lta ste/_tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/
[\[75a.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_bdag bdag ces bya ba ni/_tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sems can sems can zhes bya ba ni/_tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la 
[\[75a.3\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/srog srog ces bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gso ba gso ba zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod

[\[75a.5\]]ba ni/_tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shed can shed can zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shed 
[\[75a.6\]]bdag shed bdag ces bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med do/_/byed pa po byed pa po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[75a.7\]]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byed du 'jug pa po byed du 'jug pa po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba po tshor ba po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med do/_/tshor bar byed pa po tshor bar byed pa po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med do/_/slong ba po slong ba po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi 
[\[75b.2\]]de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kun tu slong ba po kun tu slong ba po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med do/_/shes pa po shes pa po zhes bya 
[\[75b.3\]]ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med do/_/mthong ba po mthong ba po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/reg 
[\[75b.4\]]pa po reg pa po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_rnam par shes pa po rnam par shes pa po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/_de la yang dag pa ji lta 
[\[75b.5\]]ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du 'ol spyir tha snyad du brjod do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang 
[\[75b.6\]]chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[75b.7\]]la spyod do zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du shes yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du byed yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rnam 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]gang gis tha snyad du brjod pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]de yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[76a.2\]]po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab ma gtogs par de ma yin pa'i shes rab nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyi bar du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i stong pa nyid nye bar bzung bas/_zil gyis gnon to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[76a.3\]]des gang gis mngon par chags par 'gyur ba de yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[76a.4\]]'di dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis 'di lta ste dper na/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_sba'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_smyig ma'i tshal lam/_'bras kyi zhing ngam/_til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gang bar gyur 
[\[76a.5\]]kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar 
[\[76a.6\]]mi 'gro'o/_bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[76a.7\]]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_bgrang bar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa yin te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab ni de lta ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[76b.2\]]ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_nyin gcig tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i shes rab ji tsam pa des kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab zil gyis 
[\[76b.3\]]mnan cing gnas te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta zhog gi_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dge slong khyed 'dra 
[\[76b.4\]]ba sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/
[\[76b.5\]]brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba 
[\[76b.6\]]khrag khrig stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs su yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bgrang bar yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/dper yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ste/_rgyur 
[\[76b.7\]]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhog gi_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig_/dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/

[\[77a.3\]]yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs su yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bgrang bar yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o 
[\[77a.4\]]dper yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ste/_rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta zhog gis/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[77a.5\]]gal te lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig_/dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[77a.6\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/

[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs su yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bgrang bar yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/dper yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ste/_/rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[77b.2\]]ma snyed/_dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta zhog gis/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi

[\[77b.7\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig_/dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/

[\[78a.4\]]slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta zhog gi_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig_/dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu 
[\[78a.5\]]sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong 
[\[78a.6\]]gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro 'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i char

[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ste/_rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta zhog gi_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[78b.2\]]bu gal te shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[78b.3\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba

[\[78b.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta zhog gi_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig_/dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag 
[\[78b.7\]]gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag 
[\[79a.2\]]khrig brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_grangs su yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bgrang bar yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[79a.3\]]'gro'o/_/dper yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ste/_rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu/_sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta 
[\[79a.4\]]zhog gi_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis ni byang 
[\[79a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye 
[\[79a.6\]]ba brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag

[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta zhog gi_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[79b.2\]]cig dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+ga la gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms 
[\[79b.3\]]pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar 
[\[79b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs su yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bgrang 
[\[79b.5\]]bar yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/dper yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ste/_rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta zhog gi_/
[\[79b.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig_/dge slong sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maung+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang de dag gi shes rab kyis ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[79b.7\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[80a.2\]]phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs su yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bgrang bar yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/dper yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ste/_rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang 'di 
[\[80a.3\]]nyan thos rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i shes rab dang /_gang yang rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang /_gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang /_gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[80a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang /_shes rab de dag thams cad tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa ste/_dbyer ma mchis/_/stong pa dben pa rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das dbyer ma mchis shing /_dben pa la ma skyes 
[\[80a.5\]]pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa la ni khyad par ram/_bye brag tu bgyi ba mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_gdugs gcig tu bsgoms pa'i shes 
[\[80a.6\]]rab nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[80a.7\]]pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig tu bsgoms pa bdag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod de/_sems can thams cad kyi don byas la/_chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par sangs rgyas par byas te sems can thams cad yongs su 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]mya ngan las bzla'o zhes don gang gi phyir sta gon du gnas pa de lta bu'i don du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab sta gon du gnas sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[80b.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_ji ga nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams 'di snyam du bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/_sems can thams cad phung po ma lus 
[\[80b.3\]]par mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar sems pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang de 
[\[80b.4\]]ltar khong du chud par bya ste/_gang 'di nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab dang /_gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab las/_shes rab 'di nye bar bzung na/_gang 'di nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[80b.5\]]thams cad kyi shes rab kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar 
[\[80b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye 
[\[80b.7\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs su yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bgrang bar yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/dper yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro ste/_rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_ji ga nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/_sems can yongs su smin par byas la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs 
[\[81a.2\]]par byas la/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[81a.3\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems sam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar sems pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[81a.4\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/_sems can yongs su smyin par byas la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[81a.5\]]bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[81a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_srog chags kyi rigs me khyer ni 'di ltar bdag 
[\[81a.7\]]gi snang bas 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu snang bar bya'o/_/bdag gi 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling /_rgyas par dgang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di ltar bdag cag gis pha 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/_sems can yongs su smyin par byas la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[81b.2\]]bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[81b.3\]]grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/snyam du mi sems so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni/_'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang bas rgyas par byed do/_/'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang 
[\[81b.4\]]bas gsal bar byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa yang /_sems can yongs su smyin par byas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_
[\[81b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas te/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[81b.6\]]byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom 
[\[81b.7\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das shing phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]dpa'i lam yongs su sbyong ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_
[\[82a.2\]]sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung nas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i chos la gnas te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub 
[\[82a.3\]]sems dpa'i sa 'thob bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sa gang la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[82a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma sems bskyed phyin cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin 
[\[82a.5\]]pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni shi ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod pas/_dge ba'i chos thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 
[\[82a.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bslab pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 
[\[82a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rjes su dran pa drug 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[82b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten 
[\[82b.3\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 
[\[82b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig 
[\[82b.5\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[82b.6\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar 
[\[82b.7\]]gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs lnga 'jig rten 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[83a.2\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[83a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[83a.4\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[83a.5\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i chos de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa mang po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_dge ba'i chos/_/de dag 'jig rten du byung bas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin/_khyim bdag gi 
[\[83a.6\]]rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod pa yin/_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod 
[\[83a.7\]]pa yin/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_snang ba'i 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]lha rnams yod pa yin/_chung snang gi lha rnams yod pa yin/_tshad med snang gi lha rnams yod pa yin/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod pa yin/_dge ba'i lha rnams yod pa yin/_chung dge'i lha rnams yod pa yin/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i 
[\[83b.2\]]lha rnams yod pa yin/_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_che ba'i lha rnams yod pa yin/_chung che'i lha rnams yod pa yin/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod pa yin/_'bras bu che ba'i lta rnams yod pa yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod 
[\[83b.3\]]pa yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod pa yin/_shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod pa yin/_gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod pa yin/_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_rnam 
[\[83b.4\]]shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_
[\[83b.5\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod pa yin/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod pa yin/_dgra bcom pa rnams yod pa yin/_rang sangs rgyas rnams yod pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
