[\[142a.3\]]bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/'du byed ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/'du byed da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa da 
[\[142a.4\]]ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/ming dang gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/ming dang gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/skye mched drug 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[142a.5\]]skye mched drug ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/skye mched drug da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/reg pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/reg pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/reg pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba 'das pa 
[\[142a.6\]]zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sred pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sred pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sred pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[142a.7\]]len pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/len pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/len pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/srid pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/srid pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/srid pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]sbyor ro/_/skye ba 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/skye ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/skye ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rga shi 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rga shi ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rga shi da ltar byung ba zhes bya 
[\[142b.2\]]bar mi sbyor ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'das pa zhes 
[\[142b.3\]]bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[142b.4\]]pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/brtson 
[\[142b.5\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar byung ba 
[\[142b.6\]]zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/nang stong pa nyid 'das pa 
[\[142b.7\]]zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/nang stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/nang stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid da ltar 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[143a.2\]]'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/chen po stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/chen po stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[143a.3\]]sbyor ro/_/chen po stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/'dus 
[\[143a.4\]]byas stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/'dus ma byas 
[\[143a.5\]]stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/
[\[143a.6\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 
[\[143a.7\]]da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'das 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa 
[\[143b.2\]]zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong 
[\[143b.3\]]pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dngos po med 
[\[143b.4\]]pa stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[143b.5\]]pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[143b.6\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams da ltar byung 
[\[143b.7\]]ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]'das pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dbang po rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[144a.2\]]dbang po rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/dbang po rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/stobs rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/stobs rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/stobs rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya 
[\[144a.3\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[144a.4\]]brgyad pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya 
[\[144a.5\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar 
[\[144a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/tshad med pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/gzugs 
[\[144a.7\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'das pa 
[\[144b.2\]]zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid 
[\[144b.3\]]dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[144b.4\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams da 
[\[144b.5\]]ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das pa zhes 
[\[144b.6\]]bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 
[\[144b.7\]]ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'das pa zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi da ltar 
[\[145a.2\]]byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/byams pa chen po 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/byams pa chen po ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/byams pa chen po da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/snying rje chen po 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[145a.3\]]snying rje chen po ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/snying rje chen po da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ma 'ongs pa zhes 
[\[145a.4\]]bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[145a.5\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu da 
[\[145a.6\]]ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[145a.7\]]'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rang byang chub 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rang byang chub ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rang 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]byang chub da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam pa 
[\[145b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[145b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/_gzugs brtan zhes bya ba 
[\[145b.4\]]'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/'du shes brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/'du byed brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes 
[\[145b.5\]]pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mig brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rna ba brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sna brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lce 
[\[145b.6\]]brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lus brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/yid brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor 
[\[145b.7\]]ro/_/sgra brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/dri brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/ro brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/reg brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]chos brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[146a.2\]]sna'i rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/yid kyi 
[\[146a.3\]]rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sna'i 'dus te

[\[146a.5\]]reg pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya 
[\[146a.6\]]bar mi sbyor ro/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[146a.7\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sa'i khams brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]chu'i khams brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/me'i khams brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rlung gi khams brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/nam mkha'i khams brtan zhes bya ba 'am

[\[146b.3\]]rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/skye mched drug brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/reg pa brtan zhes bya ba 
[\[146b.4\]]'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sred pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/len pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/srid pa brtan 
[\[146b.5\]]zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/skye ba brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rga shi brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi 
[\[146b.6\]]sbyor ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi 
[\[146b.7\]]brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/nang stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am

[\[147a.7\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/yang dag par spong pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/dbang po rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]sbyor ro/_/stobs rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar 
[\[147b.2\]]mi sbyor ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/bsam gtan rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[147b.3\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu brtan zhes bya ba 
[\[147b.4\]]'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/mtshan ma med pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/

[\[147b.7\]]brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/snying rje chen po brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor 
[\[148a.2\]]ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rang byang chub brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam pa thams 
[\[148a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o//_//shes rab kyi 
[\[148a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu pa/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs yod ces bya ba 'am [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[148a.5\]]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed do/_/tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/'du shes yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/'du byed yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/rnam par shes pa yod ces bya

[\[148b\]]

[\[148b.7\]]tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor

[\[149b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba 'am [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod ces

[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/dbang po rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/stobs rnams yod ces bya

[\[150a.3\]]rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/tshad med pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par

[\[150a.5\]]'byed do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams

[\[150a.7\]]'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/byams pa chen po yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/snying rje chen po yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba 
[\[150b.2\]]'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/rang byang chub yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi 
[\[150b.3\]]sbyor mi 'byed do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_spyod 
[\[150b.4\]]ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[150b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don tu 
[\[150b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[150b.7\]]pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/nang stong pa nyid 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/stong 
[\[151a.2\]]pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes 
[\[151a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes 
[\[151a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[151a.5\]]phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[151a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/skye ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/
[\[151a.7\]]'gag pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/sangs 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/
[\[151b.2\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/dbang po rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/stobs rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi don du 
[\[151b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi don du shes 
[\[151b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/tshad med pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi don du shes rab 
[\[151b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i don du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i don du/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[151b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi don du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[151b.7\]]spyod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i don tu/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]spyod do/_/byams pa chen po'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/snying rje chen po'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[152a.2\]]phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de bzhin nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[152a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_chos gang la yang tha dad pa 'am/_bye brag gam/_khyad par du lta ba med de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi 
[\[152a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/de lha'i mig gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/lha'i rna ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/sngon gyi 
[\[152a.5\]]gnas rjes su dran pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de 
[\[152a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos te/_rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mngon par shes pa dmigs pa lta ga las 'ongs/_sha ra dwa 
[\[152a.7\]]ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_bkur stir bya'o/_phu dud du 
[\[152b.2\]]bya'o/_mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror 
[\[152b.3\]]bya'o/_bkur stir bya'o/_phu dud du bya'o/_mchod par bya'o/_snyam du mi sems so/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[152b.4\]]gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_bkur stir bya'o/_phu dud du bya'o/_mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi 
[\[152b.5\]]bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_bkur stir bya'o/_/phu dud du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_byang 
[\[152b.6\]]shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_bkur stir bya'o/_phu dud du bya'o/_mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/
[\[152b.7\]]bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_bkur stir bya'o/_
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]phu dud du bya'o/_mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[153a.2\]]ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_bkur stir bya'o/_phu dud du bya'o/_mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten 
[\[153a.3\]]gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_bkur stir bya'o/_phu dud du bya'o/_mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[153a.4\]]rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_bkur stir bya'o/_phu dud du bya'o/_mchod par 
[\[153a.5\]]bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_
[\[153a.6\]]bkur stir bya'o/_phu dud du bya'o/_mchod par bya'o/_snyam du mi sems so/_/de 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang ji ston pa/_de dag thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams 
[\[153a.7\]]kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag gi sngon gyi gnas bdag gis rjes su dran par bya'o/_/lha'i mig gis sems can de dag 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_skyes par gyur pa rnams bdag gis mthong bar bya'o/_/sems can grangs med 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]tshad med pa dag bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du mi sems te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[153b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdud glags tshol zhing nyams skyod pa rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed de/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de 
[\[153b.3\]]dag thams cad kyang lhun [(]byis [,]gyis [)]grub pa dang /_yongs su brtag pa med par mthun par 'grub bo/_/'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bstsal bar 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[153b.4\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo /_/zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad 
[\[153b.5\]]do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_
[\[153b.6\]]tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu 
[\[153b.7\]]mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo /_zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /_
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[154a.2\]]lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung 
[\[154a.3\]]du 'ong ngo /_zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_
[\[154a.4\]]tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_
[\[154a.5\]]'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo /_zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la 
[\[154a.6\]]lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /_tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed 
[\[154a.7\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]lhung du 'ong ngo /_zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phral dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs 
[\[154b.2\]]lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_
[\[154b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo /_zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi 
[\[154b.4\]]skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /_tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i 
[\[154b.5\]]phyir ro/_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 
[\[154b.6\]]'ong ngo /_zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_
[\[154b.7\]]tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /_
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi 
[\[155a.2\]]skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[155a.3\]]byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[155a.4\]]sar lhung du 'ong ngo /_zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs 
[\[155a.5\]]lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba 
[\[155a.6\]]dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo /_zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi 
[\[155a.7\]]skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /_tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[155b.2\]]lhung du 'ong ngo /_zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha 
[\[155b.3\]]nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[155b.4\]]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji 
[\[155b.5\]]snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /_tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams 
[\[155b.6\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba 
[\[155b.7\]]mdzad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[156a.2\]]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa 
[\[156a.3\]]de dag kyang /_tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la/_byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 
[\[156a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad 
[\[156a.5\]]do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs 
[\[156a.6\]]chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba 
[\[156a.7\]]dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /_tshe 'di 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]nyid la thams cad du thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[156b.2\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/_/
[\[156b.3\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen 
[\[156b.4\]]dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya 
[\[156b.5\]]nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo /_/zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /_tshe 'di nyid la 
[\[156b.6\]]thams cad du thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[156b.7\]]snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo /_zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor 
[\[157a.2\]]dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_
[\[157a.3\]]shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag 
[\[157a.4\]]kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[157a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[157a.6\]]sgo dang /_spobs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo dag kyang tshegs [{]myi [,]mi [}]che bar mngon du 'gyur ro/_/skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 
[\[157a.7\]]'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_'di snyam du chos gang la la chos rnams dang 'du ba 'am/_'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/_'phrad pa 'am/_mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yod dam zhes bya bar mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[157b.2\]]des chos gang 'du ba 'am/_'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/_'phrad pa 'am mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[157b.3\]]brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_'di snyam du bdag gis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/_'on tam [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur zhes bya bar mi 
[\[157b.4\]]sems te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar 
[\[157b.5\]]spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings dang /_tha dad par yang dag par 
[\[157b.6\]]rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[157b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos rnams su bye brag tu bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'gyur ram/_'on tam khong du chud par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[158a.2\]]sems te/_de ni 'di ltar des chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de yang 'di ltar de ni chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[158a.3\]]ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs 
[\[158a.4\]]dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang gzugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang tshor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/'du shes dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/'du byed dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_
[\[158a.5\]]stong pa nyid dang 'du byed du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang [{]myig [,]mig [}]tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/rna ba dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang 
[\[158a.6\]]rna bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/sna dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor_/stong pa nyid dang snar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/lce dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang lcer [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/lus dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang lus su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/yid dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_
[\[158a.7\]]stong pa nyid dang yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/gzugs dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang gzugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/sgra dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang sgrar mi sbyor ro/_/dri dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang drir [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/ro dang stong 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang ror mi sbyor ro/_/reg dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang reg tu mi sbyor ro/_/chos dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang chos su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang 
[\[158b.2\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[158b.3\]]sbyor ro/_/rna ba'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i khams su mi sbyor ro/_/sgra'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang sgra'i khams su mi sbyor ro/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_
[\[158b.4\]]stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/sna'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang sna'i khams su mi sbyor ro/_/dri'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang dri'i khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/sna'i rnam 
[\[158b.5\]]par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_/stong pa nyid dang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/_/lce'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang lce'i khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/ro'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_/stong pa 
[\[158b.6\]]nyid dang ro'i khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/_/lus kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang lus kyi khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/
[\[158b.7\]]reg bya'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang reg bya'i khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/yid kyi khams dang stong 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/chos kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor/_stong 
[\[159a.2\]]pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni/_nyan 
[\[159a.3\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang myur tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra 
[\[159a.4\]]dwa ti'i bu/_rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni/_rab ces bya/_mchog ces bya/_dam pa zhes bya/_phul zhes bya/_gtso bo zhes bya/_gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[159a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnal 'byor te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnal 'byor to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/_bla na med 
[\[159a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i don byed kyang /_de 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 
[\[159a.7\]]pa yin nam zhe 'am/_brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mi sems so/_/bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston pa mdzad do/_/bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to/_/bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/bdag 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bya'o/_/bdag gis ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings 
[\[159b.2\]]la bye brag tu 'byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ni chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'am/_gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba 'am/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[159b.3\]]'tshang rgya ba/_de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can gyi 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/bdag gi 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/srog gi 
[\[159b.4\]]'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/'gro ba'i 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/gso ba'i 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/skyes bu'i 'du shis [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/gang zag gi 'du shes mi skye'o/_/shed can gyi 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/shed bdag gi 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/byed pa po'i 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/tshor ba 
[\[159b.5\]]po'i 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/shes pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o/_/mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te/_sems can la ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med do/_/gang la skye 
[\[159b.6\]]ba dang 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_
[\[159b.7\]]sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can rang bzhin 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 
[\[160a.2\]]'byor dam pa ste/_'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor te/_des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas 
[\[160a.3\]]so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_
[\[160a.4\]]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mngon par sgrub bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni/_ser sna'i sems mi skyed do/_/tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang 
[\[160a.5\]]gnod par sems pa'i sems dang /_le lo'i sems dang /_'khrug pa'i sems dang /_shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi skyed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[160a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/_'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha 
[\[160a.7\]]ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa 'am/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]nang nas shi 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa 
[\[160b.2\]]ste/_tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[160b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de 
[\[160b.4\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang /_dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de yang dbang po rno bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste/_de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams 
[\[160b.5\]]cad kyang der ma 'dus pa med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par 
[\[160b.6\]]dbang po rtul ba yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no/_/de la gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon tu mi 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gang khyod kyis de skad du byang chub 
[\[160b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de/_'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/_zhes smras pa ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing /_'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der 'gro ste/_nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam 
[\[161a.2\]]yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa na/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs 
[\[161a.3\]]kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas kyang des nga rgyal du mi byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa dag_/bsam gtan dang po la yang mnyam par gzhog_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang mnyam 
[\[161a.4\]]par gzhog_/bsam gtan gsum pa la yang mnyam par gzhog_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang mnyam par gzhog cing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang spyod de/_de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing /_gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob nas/_
[\[161a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la bsnyen bkur byed na yang /_de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po [{]myi [,]mi [}]rno ba yang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la yang mnyam par gzhog la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[161a.6\]]pa la yang spyod de/_de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas/_bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te/_dbang po rno ba ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[161a.7\]]'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug_/btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched 
[\[161b.2\]]la yang snyoms par 'jug_/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang snyoms par 
[\[161b.3\]]'jug_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dbang po lnga la yang snyoms par 'jug_/stobs lnga la yang snyoms par 'jug_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang snyoms par 'jug_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang snyoms par 
[\[161b.4\]]'jug_/snying rje chen po la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas/_bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye/_tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste/_
[\[161b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs shing /_'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do/_/de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[161b.6\]]tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/
[\[161b.7\]]bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug_/btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /_de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[162a.2\]]dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/de dag ni phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang /_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/_/bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/_/khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste/_
[\[162a.3\]]de yang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyis/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan 
[\[162a.4\]]gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug_/btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug_/
[\[162a.5\]]nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/'du shis med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug 
[\[162a.6\]]cing /_de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba yang yod de/_de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam 
[\[162a.7\]]par skye'o/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]skye ste/_de dag na gnas shing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub 
[\[162b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag_/thabs mkhas pas/_bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 
[\[162b.3\]]'jug/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug_/btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye 
[\[162b.4\]]mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par [(]'dug[,]'jug[) ]/'du shes med 'du shes med [{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug pa yod de/_de dag ni 'di 
[\[162b.5\]]nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/_/de dag de na yang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na yang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te/_de dag de na 'khod cing gang na/_de bzhin 
[\[162b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing /_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing 'dong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[162b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]pa dag thabs mkhas pas/_bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/byams 
[\[163a.2\]]pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug_/btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 
[\[163a.3\]]yang snyoms par 'jug_/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang yongs su sgom/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang yongs su sgom/_
[\[163a.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang yongs su sgom/_dbang po lnga la yang yongs su sgom/_stobs lnga la yang yongs su sgom/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang yongs su sgom/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang yongs su sgom/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[163a.5\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba yang yod de/_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur cing /_de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/_dga' 
[\[163a.6\]]ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/_/de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas nas/_dbang po mnyam pa dang /_dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te/_mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[163a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dag kyang yod do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]gcig pa/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/_gzugs kyi khams su yang mi skye/_gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye bar/_
[\[163b.2\]]de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[163b.3\]]'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag_/mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang 
[\[163b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag_/mngon par 
[\[163b.5\]]shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[163b.6\]]dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag_/'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing /_
[\[163b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi legs pa rjod/_chos kyi legs pa rjod/_dge 'dun gyi legs pa rjod pas/_sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te/_de nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin cad bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi 
[\[164a.2\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[164a.3\]]bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[164a.4\]]dag kyang thob nas/_de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/_gzugs kyi khams su yang mi skye/_gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye zhing /_de dag tu yang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[164a.5\]]dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[164a.6\]]chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing /_mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas nas phung po ma lus 
[\[164a.7\]]pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing /_de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 
[\[164b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[164b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/_tshad med pa bzhi thob pa/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis/_tshul du 
[\[164b.4\]]mas rnam par rtse zhing /_'di lta ste/_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go_/de dag bsam gtan dang po de las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_
