[\[164b.5\]]bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms 
[\[164b.6\]]par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan bzhi pa las 
[\[164b.7\]]langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/_'gog 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms 
[\[165a.2\]]par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/cung zad med pa'i skye mched las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/'gog pa'i 
[\[165a.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[165a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra 
[\[165a.5\]]dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thob pa/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi thob pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa/_dbang po lnga thob pa/_stobs lnga thob pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun thob pa/_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[165a.6\]]lag brgyad pa thob pa/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa/_bsam gtan rnams thob pa/_tshad med pa rnams thob pa/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams thob pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa/_stong pa nyid dang 
[\[165a.7\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa thob pa/_mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad thob pa dag_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po thob kyang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed/_rang byang 
[\[165b.2\]]chub thob par mi byed kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la yongs su ston par byed de/_sems can de dag des rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[165b.3\]]pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/_sha 
[\[165b.4\]]ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi 
[\[165b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni/_phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs 
[\[165b.6\]]su sbyong ba dag kyang yod de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_
[\[165b.7\]]bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi thob pa/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa/_mngon par shes pa drug thob ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]pa bzhi thob pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad thob pa dag_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod kyang bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang 
[\[166a.2\]]yod de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[166a.3\]]nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing de dag gi sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa 
[\[166a.4\]]grangs med tshad med pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don du rtag par brtson 
[\[166a.5\]]te/_nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig mi smra/_gnod pa dang ldan pa'i lus kyi las dang /_yid kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_sems 
[\[166a.6\]]can rnams kyi don rtag tu brtson pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gsum po rgyun gcod pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu 
[\[166a.7\]]phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/_sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing /_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang /_skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang /_
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang /_me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang /_spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang /_phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang /_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang /_mal stan 'dod pa rnams la mal stan dang /_gos 'dod pa 
[\[166b.2\]]rnams la gos dang /_nor bu 'dod pa rnams la nor bu dang /_mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang /_gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang /_dngul 'dod pa rnams la dngul dang /_byi ru 'dod pa rnams la byi ru dang /_rgyan 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang /_
[\[166b.3\]]'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba dang /_khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyis yongs su sdud cing 'tsho ba'i yo byad skyon med pa yongs su sgrub pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin 
[\[166b.4\]]pa drug la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/_sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha 
[\[166b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/_sems can rnams khro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gnod sems med pa la rab tu 'god pa byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[166b.6\]]dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/_sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub 
[\[166b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/_sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang /_'dod pa las dben pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/_/dge ba bcu'i 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]las kyi lam gyi bar la sems can rnams rab tu bkod nas/_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams nas 'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha'i bar du skye zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang 
[\[167a.2\]]rgya'o/_/shar dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs nas/_bsam gtan las yongs su nyams te/_bsam gtan dang po'i ro myangs nas/_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba yang yod do/_/de yang 
[\[167a.3\]]bsam gtan bsgrubs nas 'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lhar skyes te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshangs pa'i 'jig 
[\[167a.4\]]rten nas shi 'phos nas/_gnas gtsang mar skyes te/_gnas gtsang ma'i gnas gcig gam/_gnyis rgal te/_'og min du skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya 
[\[167a.5\]]ba yang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/_
[\[167a.6\]]sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams dang /_byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan song thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir chos ston pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha 
[\[167a.7\]]ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de 
[\[167b.2\]]dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis 
[\[167b.3\]]thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang 
[\[167b.4\]]chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po 
[\[167b.5\]]yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /_sems 
[\[167b.6\]]can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[167b.7\]]zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'iklung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub 
[\[168a.2\]]sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye bdag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po 
[\[168a.3\]]yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong 
[\[168a.4\]]zhing /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag 
[\[168a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 
[\[168a.6\]]skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems 
[\[168a.7\]]dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /_
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'iklung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /_sems can rnams la chos ston 
[\[168b.2\]]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su 
[\[168b.3\]]bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/nub byang gi 
[\[168b.4\]]phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[168b.5\]]kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 
[\[168b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[168b.7\]]la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag mthong bar byed cing /_de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa/_sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 
[\[169a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[169a.3\]]yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang 
[\[169a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[169a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ro rmyongs nas tshangs ris nas/_dge rgyas kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/_/de nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/_
[\[169a.6\]]srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 
[\[169a.7\]]gyur pa de/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/_srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar yang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/_dbang po gsal zhing lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ldan par gyur nas/_de dag lus yongs su dag pa 
[\[169b.2\]]de dag gis skye bo mang po'i dga' ba dang /_mos pa skyed de/_de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang /_sems can de dag kyang sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/_mthar kyis theg pa gsum 
[\[169b.3\]]gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[169b.4\]]ngag yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/_/yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa de dag dbang po shin 
[\[169b.5\]]tu gsal ba thob nas/_de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis/_bdag mi stod cing /_gzhan mi smod pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems 
[\[169b.6\]]bskyed phyin cad/_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyi nad pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin dpal gnas shing /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul bar mi 'gyur zhing /_log par mi 'gro ba dang /_ngan song 
[\[169b.7\]]du mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_dang po sems bskyed phyin cad/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[170a.2\]]rgyal por gyur nas/_de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_ngag snyan pas sems can yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar yang byang chub sems 
[\[170a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma la gnas shing /_
[\[170a.4\]]de dag la gnas nas/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang /_mchod pa sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_
[\[170a.5\]]mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_sems can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[170a.6\]]kyis snang bar byed pa dang /_bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang /_nam yang 'bral bar mi byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[170a.7\]]ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs shing /_nyan thos rnams kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rang byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de thabs mkhas pas srog chags brgya 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]stong bye ba phrag mang po theg pa gsum gyis yongs su smin par byas nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[170b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang /_
[\[170b.3\]]ngag dang /_yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[170b.4\]]po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/_ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[170b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing /_'di ni lus yin gyis/_des ni lus kyi las shig brtsam/_'di ni ngag yin gyis/_des ni ngag gi las shig brtsam/_'di ni yid yin gyis/_
[\[170b.6\]]des ni yid kyi las shig brtsam snyam na/_de ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub 
[\[170b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/_lus gang dang /_ngag gang dang /_yid gang gis 'jungs pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/_gnod 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]sems kyi sems bskyed pa 'am/_le lo'i sems bskyed pa 'am/_'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu'i lus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/ngag 
[\[171a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len 
[\[171a.3\]]skyed pa dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa tsam du ni shes par mi bya ste/_de ni gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[171a.4\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo /_/ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo /_/yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lus kyi 
[\[171a.5\]]las kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_lus kyi gnas 
[\[171a.6\]]ngan len sbyong ba lags/_ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/_yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[171a.7\]]lus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_ngag [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/_ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]su sbyong ba yin/_yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sems dang po bskyed phyin cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag 
[\[171b.2\]]par blangs te gnas shing /_nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhog na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[171b.3\]]lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_byang chub kyi lam yongs 
[\[171b.4\]]su sbyong zhing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_
[\[171b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[171b.6\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam lus la dmigs pa med pa dang /_ngag la dmigs pa med pa dang /_yid la dmigs pa med pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa 
[\[171b.7\]]med pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_nyan 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]thos kyi theg pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa med pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa med pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[172a.2\]]med par gyur pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/_'di ltar chos thams cad la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing blang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[172a.3\]]chen po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nan tan du byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa'i rnams thub pa ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[172a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_tshor ba la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'du shes la rlom sems med pa dang /_'du byed la 
[\[172a.5\]]rlom sems med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]dang gzugs la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rna ba dang sgra la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sna dang dril rlom sems med pa dang /_lce dang rol rlom sems med pa dang /_lus dang reg 
[\[172a.6\]]la rlom sems med pa dang /_yid dang chos la rlom sems med pa dang /_sa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_chu'i khams la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_rlung gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_nam mkha'i 
[\[172a.7\]]khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_mig gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]rna ba'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_sgra'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_sna'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_dri'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes 
[\[172b.2\]]pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_lce'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_ro'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_lus kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_reg bya'i khams la 
[\[172b.3\]]rlom sems med pa dang /_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_yid kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_chos kyi khams la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_rten 
[\[172b.4\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rlom sems med pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[172b.5\]]phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_phyi nang 
[\[172b.6\]]stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_'dus ma byas 
[\[172b.7\]]stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rlom 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 
[\[173a.2\]]la rlom sems med pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[173a.3\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /_dbang po lnga la rlom sems med pa dang /_stobs lnga la rlom sems med pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rlom sems med pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rlom sems 
[\[173a.4\]]med pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa 
[\[173a.5\]]brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems med pa dang /_stong pa nyid la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon 
[\[173a.6\]]par shes pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems med pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems med pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[173a.7\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byams pa chen po la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_snying rje chen po la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang /_lam 
[\[173b.2\]]gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang /_'khor ba la rlom sems med pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems med par gyur pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[173b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/_sus kyang thub pa med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye 
[\[173b.4\]]shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_ye shes de dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye/_mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur te/_lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na smad par 'gyur ba 
[\[173b.5\]]de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[173b.6\]]dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lus gang dang ldan pas/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par 
[\[173b.7\]]mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[174a.2\]]zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye bdag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[174a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de 
[\[174a.4\]]lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+g+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems 
[\[174a.5\]]dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[174a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[174a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[174b.2\]]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par 
[\[174b.3\]]phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[174b.4\]]rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_
[\[174b.5\]]nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_
[\[174b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[174b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos 
[\[175a.2\]]kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/chos 
[\[175a.3\]]kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi skyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed 
[\[175a.4\]]do/_/gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/
[\[175a.5\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[175a.6\]]tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/_nang stong 
[\[175a.7\]]pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid sgom ste/_phyi stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/_phyi nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chen po stong pa nyid sgom ste/_

[\[175b.1\]]chen po stong pa nyid mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/_don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/_'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi 
[\[175b.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/_

[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]rang byang chub sgom ste/_rang byang chub mi dmigs so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom ste/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[176b.2\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/_ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 
[\[176b.3\]]kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang /_yongs su sbyong ba yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sha'i 
[\[176b.4\]]mig dang /_lha'i mig dang /_shes rab kyi mig dang /_chos kyi mig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mig go_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[176b.5\]]stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yod do/_/sha 
[\[176b.6\]]ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad sum brgya mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bzhi brgya mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[176b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad lnga brgya mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad drug brgya mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bdun brgya mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgyad brgya mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[177a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad dgu brgya mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad stong mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[177a.3\]]dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis 'dzam+bu'i gling mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis gling gnyis mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis 
[\[177a.4\]]gling gsum mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis 
[\[177a.5\]]stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i 
[\[177a.6\]]mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[177a.7\]]chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems

[\[177b.3\]]lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni

[\[177b.5\]]rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub

[\[177b.7\]]lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/

[\[178a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
