[\[178b.3\]]kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[178b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung dge'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dge 
[\[178b.5\]]rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/_che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung che'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang 
[\[178b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[178b.7\]]lha'i mig de ni mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]kyis mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis 
[\[179a.2\]]mi shes te/_lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_/lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan 
[\[179a.3\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_/lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[179a.4\]]po ni nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_/lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[179a.5\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_/lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 
[\[179a.6\]]sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_/lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'iklung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 
[\[179a.7\]]'pho dang skye ba rab tu shis so/_/lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_/
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_/lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan 
[\[179b.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_
[\[179b.3\]]steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'iklung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o//_//
[\[179b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[179b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_dge ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/_kha na ma tho ba 
[\[179b.6\]]med pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/_zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang /_shes rab kyi mig gang dang 
[\[179b.7\]]ldan pas/_chos gang yang ma mthong ba med/_ma thos pa med/_ma bsams pa med/_khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[180a.2\]]chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/_gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba/_gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/_gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang 
[\[180a.3\]]po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_the tsom dang tshul khrims 
[\[180a.4\]]dang /_brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/_gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed 
[\[180a.5\]]de/_gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/_gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/de lam de nyid de bas kyang 
[\[180a.6\]]shin tu bsgoms pas/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgod pa rab tu spong ste/_gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/_gang zag 'di'i 
[\[180a.7\]]dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_the tshom dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/_gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/_'dod pa'i 'dod 
[\[180b.2\]]chags dang /_ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/_gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/_gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 
[\[180b.3\]]'ong ba'o/_/de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgod pa rab tu spong ste/_gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la 
[\[180b.4\]]gnas pa ste/_gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[180b.5\]]rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_the tshom dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/_gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des bsgom pa'i lam rab 
[\[180b.6\]]tu thob nas/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/_gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed 
[\[180b.7\]]de/_gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgod pa rab tu spong ste/_gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ji yang rung 
[\[181a.2\]]ste/_kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can no zhes bya bar shes pas/_dad pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/_'di ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/
[\[181a.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[181a.4\]]spyod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[181a.5\]]dbang po dang ldan te/_thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te/_lus yongs su 'dzin pa byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/_/bram ze che zhing 
[\[181a.6\]]mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/_/khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o/_/mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o/_/dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o/_/'phrul dga'i 
[\[181a.7\]]lha'i nang du skye'o/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/_/de de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]yongs su dag par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[181b.2\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar tu phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[181b.3\]]'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[181b.4\]]pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/_/'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/'di ni nges pa'o/_/'di ni ma nges pa'o/_/'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ste/_/dbang po thob pa'o/_/'di dag ni 
[\[181b.5\]]phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste/_dbang po ma thob pa'o/_/'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas 
[\[181b.6\]]shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/_/rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed do/_
[\[181b.7\]]lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/_/rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed do/_/
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/_/rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud 
[\[182a.2\]]dang /_mchod pa byed do/_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/_/rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_
[\[182a.3\]]phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed do/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/_/rim 
[\[182a.4\]]gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed do/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes 
[\[182a.5\]]par byed do/_/rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed do/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[182a.6\]]rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/_/rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed do/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[182a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/_/rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed do/_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/_/rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed do/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du song zhing /_de bzhin 
[\[182b.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/_/rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa byed do/_/'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'dis ni mngon par shes pa 
[\[182b.3\]]thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o/_/'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no/_/'di ni dbang po thob pa'o/_/'di ni dbang po thob pa ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 
[\[182b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[182b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o/_/'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so/_/'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 
[\[182b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'di la legs pa brjod pa mdzad do/_/'di la ni legs pa brjod pa mi mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas 
[\[182b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/_
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med 
[\[183a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur 
[\[183a.3\]]ro/_/'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o/_/'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no/_/'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni 'dug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di dag la ni 
[\[183a.4\]]bdud yod par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[183a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/_rnam pa 
[\[183a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/[ {]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa yin/_byams pa chen po 
[\[183a.7\]]dang ldan pa yin/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/_dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa yin/_btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin/_de ni de'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]ste/_
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]myig [,]mig [}]de dang ldan pas/_rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba 'am/_ma thos pa 'am/_ma shes pa 'am/_khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[183b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]myig [,]mig [}]lnga yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /_thob par 'dod pas 
[\[183b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_
[\[183b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smra bas/_dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus zhes brjod pa zhig tu dgos na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[183b.5\]]na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig lnga skyed pa'o/_/mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[183b.6\]]ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/_de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do/_/de ni sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo 
[\[183b.7\]]bar byed do/_/gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro/_/mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/snang ba dang /_mi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do/_/rtseg pa las thal ba dang /_rab las thal ba dang /_ri las thal bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]'gro ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/sa la yang gyen du 'byung ba dang /_'og tu 'dzul ba byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/
[\[184a.2\]]chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/du bar 'thul zhing myer 'bar te/_dper na [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po chen po bzhin no/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas 
[\[184a.3\]]byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te/_rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin stong pa dang /_rang bzhin dben pa dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir des rdzu 'phrul gang 
[\[184a.4\]]gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs te/_de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[184a.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/_de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pas lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/_
[\[184a.6\]]lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang /_rang bzhin dben pa dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/_rna ba dang sgrar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_de thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[184a.7\]]nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa tsam yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/_/des sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang 
[\[184b.2\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag 
[\[184b.3\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[184b.4\]]bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[184b.5\]]du rab tu shes so/_/sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[184b.6\]]du rab tu shes so/_/nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[184b.7\]]shes so/_/rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rgya chung ba'i sems la rgyu chung ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rgya che ba'i sems 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]la rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i 
[\[185a.2\]]sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag 
[\[185a.3\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[185a.4\]]bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[185a.5\]]rab tu shes so/_/zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[185a.6\]]shes so/_/nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/bla na med pa'i 
[\[185a.7\]]sems la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med do/_/de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir te/_de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]bar rlom sems med do/_/'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang rang bzhin dben pa dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/_gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems 
[\[185b.2\]]shes par bya ba'i bsam pa 'am/_sems shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can thams cad 
[\[185b.3\]]kyi sems dang /_spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/_/de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par sgrub ste/_sems gcig kyang rjes su 
[\[185b.4\]]dran pa nas/_sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas nyi ma brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/zla ba gcig rjes su dran pa nas zla ba brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/lo gcig rjes su dran pa nas lo brgya'i bar 
[\[185b.5\]]du yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa gcig rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa brgya phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa stong phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal 
[\[185b.6\]]pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran te/_bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug_/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig 
[\[185b.7\]]tu gyur te/_de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/_che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/_de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas gtan tshigs dang bcas don rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te/_bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[186a.2\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de/_/'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang /_rang bzhin dben pa dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/_gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi 
[\[186a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don du bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_/
[\[186a.4\]]sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/_/de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/_sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye bo dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa dang bzang ba dang /_
[\[186a.5\]]ngan pa dang /_ngan song na gnas pa dang /_bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang /_yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log 
[\[186a.6\]]par lta ba rnams te/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas/_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang /_yid kyis 
[\[186a.7\]]legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'debs pa/_yang dag par lta ba rnams te/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang /_'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/de ni 'di ltar 
[\[186b.2\]{]myig [,]mig [}]de [{]myig [,]mig [}]ma yin zhing bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir te/_de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang /_rang bzhin dben pa dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]de 
[\[186b.3\]]lta bu des [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i mig gi bsam pa 'am/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[186b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/_/de ni zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs 
[\[186b.5\]]rgyas kyis thob par mi byed do/_/gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon 
[\[186b.6\]]mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong bar byed de/_zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon par shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/_de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom 
[\[186b.7\]]sems [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang /_rang bzhin dben pa dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ni thams cad 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/_zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa 'am zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[187a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de 
[\[187a.3\]]ltar spyod cing /_mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[187a.4\]]pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems 
[\[187a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ltung ba bya ba med pa nye bar bzung bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba 
[\[187a.6\]]dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'khrug pa nye bar bzung 
[\[187a.7\]]bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus mi gzhig pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[187b.2\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'khrug pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang 
[\[187b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi dmigs pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa 
[\[187b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[187b.5\]]phyir 'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa nye bar bzung ba dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nye bar bzung bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin no/_/de la sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/_/tshul 
[\[187b.6\]]khrims ni tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/_/bzod pa ni 'khrug pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/_/brtson 'grus ni le lo nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/_/ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/_/
[\[187b.7\]]shes rab ni shes rab 'chal pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags te/_de ni rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ma rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/sbyin pa mi byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]tshul khrims dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshul khrims ngan pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bzod pa phun sum tshogs so zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/khro ba can no zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[188a.2\]]brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/le lo can no zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shes rab dang ldan 
[\[188a.3\]]no zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shes rab 'chal pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rim gro 
[\[188a.4\]]ma byas so zhes bya rab rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma skyes pa ni spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/rim gro ma 
[\[188a.5\]]byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlom sems thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir te/_'di la sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[188a.6\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med de/_de yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[188a.7\]]yang yongs su dag par byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]sems bskyed de/_sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed nas/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob nas/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 'god 
[\[188b.2\]]do/_/de ni tshe 'di nyid la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byon cing dben par bya ba yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_nyan thos thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben par bya 
[\[188b.3\]]ba yin/_/de ni skye ba gang dang gang du skyes kyang /_de dang de dag tu nam yang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rna bas yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i sgra [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos so/_/snas yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i dri [{]myi [,]mi [}]tshor ro/_/lces yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i ro [{]myi [,]mi [}]myong ngo /_/
[\[188b.4\]]lus kyis yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i reg bya [{]myi [,]mi [}]reg go_/yid kyis yid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i chos rnam par rig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[188b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_dge slong sum brgyas gos gyon gyon pa bcom ldan 'das la yon du gsol te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[188b.6\]]chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[188b.7\]]'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]pa mi mdzad na/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag 
[\[189a.2\]]ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig 'das nas/_bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_de 
[\[189a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye'o/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug cus kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_de dag kyang de bzhin 
[\[189a.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid du rab tu byung nas tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang /_de dag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[189a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe 'khor bzhi po de dag ni 'di na 'khod bzhin du/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/_/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/_/
[\[189a.6\]]nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/_/lho 
[\[189a.7\]]nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/_/'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/_/steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/_/
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bur mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba de dag ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na yod par ma mthong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[189b.2\]]'khor de'i nang nas/_srog chags stong phrag bcus bdag cag gis las gang byas pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las spyad par bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs 
[\[189b.3\]]su chud nas/_zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/_bcom 
[\[189b.4\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo srog chags 
[\[189b.5\]]stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[189b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang nam du yang mi 'bral te/_phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[189b.7\]]ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal chen po'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bshes pa'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang /_dge slong gzhan dag kyang kun gyis mngon par shes pa 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]shin tu mang ba dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang ba dag dang /_dge slong pha dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen pha dang /_dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[190a.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[190a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[190a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu

[\[190a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gya nom pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzang po'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[190a.7\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltag na ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[190b.2\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[190b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[190b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang gi mtshan nyid 
[\[190b.5\]]stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[190b.6\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[190b.7\]]yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thug pa ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub

[\[191a.3\]]gyur to/_yongs su rdzogs so/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[191a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs so/_/

[\[191a.7\]]spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa bsgoms so/_/sgom mo/_/sgom par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/

[\[191b.1\]]yongs su rdzogs so/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms so/_/sgom mo/_/sgom par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/yongs su rdzogs so/_/yongs su rdzogs par

[\[192b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin du 
[\[192b.6\]]bcas pas/_phyag bgyi ba lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[192b.7\]]kyi bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa dag ni lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin du bcas pas/_phyag bya bar 'os pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/_mi'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 
[\[193a.2\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen 
[\[193a.3\]]bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mche ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phrul 
[\[193a.4\]]dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs 
[\[193a.5\]]pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad med snang ba'i 
[\[193a.6\]]lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun snang dang pa'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad med dge ba'i lha 
[\[193a.7\]]rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig

[\[193b.3\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[193b.4\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_
[\[193b.5\]]bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_khyim dang /_'tsho ba dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo 
[\[193b.6\]]byad [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]rkyen dang /_lha rdzas su bya ba 'am/_yang dag par bral ba'i bde ba yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/_'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems 
[\[193b.7\]]dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_bdag sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor ro/_/bdag tshul khrims srung zhing /_gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro/_/bdag bzod pa 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]sgom zhing gzhan yang bzod pa la sbyor ro/_/bdag brtson 'grus rtsom zhing gzhan yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ro/_/bdag bsam gtan skyed cing gzhan yang bsam gtan la sbyor ro/_/bdag shes rab sgom zhing gzhan yang 
[\[194a.2\]]shes rab sgom pa la sbyor ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing /_sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/_de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs 
[\[194a.3\]]pa thams cad 'thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde pa'i don tu zhugs pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram 
[\[194a.4\]]ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do/_/de nas de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma dang /_kha dog sna tshogs su ldan pa mang po byung bar gyur to/_/de byung nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[194a.5\]]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas 
[\[194a.6\]]par gyur to/_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/shar lho'i phyogs 
[\[194a.7\]]mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen 
[\[194b.2\]]pos rgyas par gyur to/_/de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[194b.3\]]ldan 'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni 
[\[194b.4\]]nub phyogs logs na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/_
[\[194b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[194b.6\]]snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen 
[\[194b.7\]]pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[195a.2\]]phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od 
[\[195a.3\]]rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/_/
[\[195a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni shar phyogs logs na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 
[\[195a.5\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen 
[\[195a.6\]]pos khyab par mdzad do/_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[195a.7\]]la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dge snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni lho phyogs 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[195b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[195b.3\]]snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen 
[\[195b.4\]]pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[195b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan 
[\[195b.6\]]pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 
[\[195b.7\]]'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/_/sangs 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[196a.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[196a.3\]]po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[196a.4\]]gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[196a.5\]]bu dag 'di ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang 
[\[196a.6\]]po bkram nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig 
[\[196a.7\]]rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags/_zhes yongs su dris so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed ces bya 
[\[196b.2\]]ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes 
[\[196b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[196b.4\]]chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris 
[\[196b.5\]]so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 
[\[196b.6\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab 
[\[196b.7\]]par mdzad do/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[197a.2\]]kyi bu dag 'di ni 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/_
[\[197a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[197a.4\]]dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de 
[\[197a.5\]]la phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag kyang blta ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[197a.6\]]gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes na dengs shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs la spyi bos 
[\[197a.7\]]phyag 'tshal nas/_lan bdun du g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te/_phyogs bcu nas/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_na bza' dang /_gser gyi me tog dang /_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]dngul gyi me tog la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa rnam pa du ma khyer te/_glu dang rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba mang pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal chen 
[\[197b.2\]]bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad 
[\[197b.3\]]med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma pa shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[197b.4\]]gdung ba dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pal dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mud dang /_pun d+ha ri ka dang /_lha rdzas kyi man dwa ra ba dang /_man dwa ra ba chen po 
[\[197b.5\]]dang /_ke sa ra dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma mang po khyer te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_lha de dag gis me 
[\[197b.6\]]tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 
[\[197b.7\]]gtor to/_/mngon par gtor to/_/de nas me tog la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi ka ba bzhi dang ldan pa cha kun tu mnyam pa/_
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]shin tu rnam par phye ba mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar red de 'dug go_/de nas 'khor de'i nang na/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de/_
[\[198a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_gang brnyes par gyur pa'i chos kyi rnam pa de lta bu thams cad 
[\[198a.3\]]thob par gyur te/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'di lta bu ni yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/da ltar 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'khor 'di dang 'dra bar ni chos bstan par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[198a.4\]]'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud de/_chos thams cad la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la bzod par gyur par mkhyen nas/_zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[198a.5\]]dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs 
[\[198a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'khor 'di'i nang nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis 
[\[198a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na/_bskal pa me tog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]yan lag me tog ces bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_shA ri'i bu'i le'u ste/_gnyis so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_
[\[198b.2\]]bam po bcu gsum pa/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtsom ste/_ji 
[\[198b.3\]]nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/_'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs pa skyed cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag 
[\[198b.4\]]dang /_lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam ste/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang /_spobs pa tsam gyi stobs dang /_shugs kyi go cas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston tam/_'on tam sangs 
[\[198b.5\]]rgyas kyi mthus ston par 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems 
[\[198b.6\]]kyis yongs su shes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni gang ci smra yang rung /_gang ci ston kyang rung /_gang ci rjod kyang rung ste/_de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_
[\[198b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan pa de thams cad kyang chos nyid dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu de dag ni chos bstan pa de la slob cing chos nyid de lta bu mngon du byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs kyis ston pa mdzad kyi/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ni/_nyan thos dang 
[\[199a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[199a.3\]]zhes bgyi ba 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba de lta bu bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma 
[\[199a.4\]]mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni su zhig_/
[\[199a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[199a.6\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]du bya ba de dag ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can sems can zhes 
[\[199a.7\]]bya bar ming du gdags pa'i ming de ni btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_bdag bdag ces bya bar [{]mying [,]ming [}]du gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]de ni btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag 
[\[199b.2\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_srog srog ces bya bar [{]mying [,]ming [}]du gdags pa'i ming de ni btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang 
[\[199b.3\]]brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'gro ba 'gro ba zhes bya bar [{]mying [,]ming [}]du gdags 
[\[199b.4\]]pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]de ni btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par/_skye ba 'am/_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi 
[\[199b.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gso ba gso ba zhes bya bar [{]mying [,]ming [}]du gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]de ni btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa med ces 
[\[199b.6\]{]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu skyes bu zhes bya bar [{]mying [,]ming [}]du gdags pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]de ni btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du

[\[200a\]]

[\[202a\]]

[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]pa de la 'di lta ste/_ro zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka med par yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor reg ces bya ba 'di ni chos su

[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor rna ba'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/_rna ba'i khams shes [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags 
[\[203a.2\]]pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor sgra'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la 'di lta

[\[203a.5\]]yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor sna'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/_sna'i khams shes [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 
[\[203a.6\]]'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor dri'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/_dri'i khams shes [{]mying [,]ming [}]
[\[203a.7\]]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[203b.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor lce'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/_lce'i khams shes [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na

[\[203b.4\]]gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa 
[\[203b.5\]]de la 'di lta ste/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams shes [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor

[\[203b.7\]]yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor reg bya'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/_reg bya'i khams shes [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]par skye ba'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_
