[\[204a.4\]]rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor chos kyi khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/_chos kyi khams shes [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma 
[\[204a.5\]]gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa 
[\[204a.6\]]de la 'di lta ste/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[204a.7\]]de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]zhes bya ba dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]zhes bya bar ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[204b.2\]]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nang gi lus zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/_mgo'i rus pa zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /_mjing pa'i rus pa zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /_phrag 
[\[204b.3\]]pa'i rus pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /_dpung pa'i rus pa zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /_tshigs pa'i rus pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /_rtsib ma'i rus pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /_dpyi'i rus 
[\[204b.4\]]pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /_brla'i rus pa zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /_rje ngar gyi rus pa zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /_rkang pa'i rus pa zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du tha snyad kyis gdags pa de dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du 
[\[204b.5\]]zad de/_chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/_mgo'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang /_mjing pa'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang /_phrag pa'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang /_dpung pa'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang /_tshigs pa'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang /_rtsib ma'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[204b.6\]]dpyi'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang /_brla'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang /_rje ngar gyi rus pa zhes bya ba dang /_rkang pa'i rus pa zhes bya bar [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi rol na yang 
[\[204b.7\]{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]du bya ba dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]su btags pa de la ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_
[\[205a.2\]]dper na/_gang 'di phyi rol gyi rtswa dang /_shing dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma zhes bya ba de dag thams cad kyang [{]mying [,]ming [}]sna tshogs kyis tha snyad du brjod de/_de dag kyang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par/_skye ba 'am 'gag pa 
[\[205a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]zhes bya ba de 
[\[205a.4\]]dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[205a.5\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mtshan tsam zhig yod pa'ang /_mtshan de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam dang /_
[\[205a.6\]]sgra brnyan dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs 
[\[205a.7\]]par skye ba 'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]{]mying [,]ming [}]zhes bya ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[205b.2\]]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang brdar btags pa dang /_gdams ngag tu btags pa dang /_chos su btags pa la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[205b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas ni/_gzugs zhes bya ba rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba bde 
[\[205b.4\]]bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba bdag tu yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs 
[\[205b.5\]]zhes bya ba zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba stong par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba mi stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[205b.6\]]gzugs zhes bya ba mtshan ma yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba mtshan ma med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba smon pa yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba smon pa med 
[\[205b.7\]]par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba 'dus byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba 'dus ma byas su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba kun nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba 'gag par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong 
[\[206a.2\]]ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba dben par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba dge bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge bar yang 
[\[206a.3\]]dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba kha na ma tho ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba zag pa dang bcas par yang dag par 
[\[206a.4\]]rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[206a.5\]]ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba 'jig rten par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba 'jig rten las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba 'khor bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs zhes bya ba mya 
[\[206a.6\]]ngan las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba 
[\[206a.7\]]zhes bya ba sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]tshor ba zhes bya ba ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba mi stong par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba mtshan ma yod par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/
[\[206b.2\]]tshor ba zhes bya ba mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba smon pa yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba smon pa med par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba 'dus byas su yang dag par rjes 
[\[206b.3\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba 'dus ma byas su yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba kun nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba skye 
[\[206b.4\]]bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba dben par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]dben par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba dge bar 
[\[206b.5\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba kha na ma thob [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba 
[\[206b.6\]]zhes bya ba zag pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[206b.7\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten las 'das par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes bya ba 'khor bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba zhes 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]bya ba mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba bde bar yang 
[\[207a.2\]]dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba bdag tu yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba 
[\[207a.3\]]zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba stong par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]stong par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba mtshan 
[\[207a.4\]]ma yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba mtshan ma med par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba smon pa yod par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du shes zhes bya ba smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su mi

[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]dge bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba kha na ma tho ba dang /_bcas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes

[\[214b.4\]]dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba rtag par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yang

[\[215a.1\]]mthong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba smon pa yod par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba smon

[\[215b.2\]]dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba 'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung zhes bya ba de yang rtag par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/bde bar

[\[222a.6\]]rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gang yang lce dang ro dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde ba'am/_/sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung zhes bya ba de yang rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yang dag

[\[225b.6\]]mthong ngo //_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bco lnga pa/_/gang yang lus dang reg bya dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma

[\[229b.7\]]tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]de 'dus byas kyi khams na yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dus ma byas kyi khams na yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor de 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos de dag thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_

[\[233b.1\]]par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_shes rab

[\[233b.3\]]par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi ming yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_shes rab kyi 
[\[233b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang

[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems 
[\[234a.2\]]dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_shes rab

[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong 
[\[234b.2\]]ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par

[\[235a.3\]]rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas

[\[235b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes

[\[236a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi

[\[236a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/
[\[236a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[236a.7\]]tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sangs 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]rgyas kyi ming yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/shes rab 
[\[236b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/
[\[236b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu rtogs pa yin te/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi 
[\[236b.4\]]mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang brdar bya ba'i chos kyi gdags pa khong 
[\[236b.5\]]du chud par bya ste/_de ltar des [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brdar bya ba'i chos su gdags pa khong du chud nas/_gzugs la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du shes la chags par 'gyur ba 
[\[236b.6\]]med do/_/rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur 
[\[236b.7\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang yang [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang gzugs dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skye ba de la yang chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba la 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/sgra la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/gang yang rna ba dang sgra dang /_rna ba'i 
[\[237a.2\]]rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skye ba de la yang chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dri la chags par 'gyur ba 
[\[237a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang yang sna dang dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba 'am/_bde ba yang 
[\[237a.4\]]ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skye ba de la yang chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ro la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags 
[\[237a.5\]]par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang yang lce dang ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skye ba de la yang chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus la 
[\[237a.6\]]chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/reg bya la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang yang lus dang reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te 
[\[237a.7\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba 'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skye ba de la yang chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/chos la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid kyi rnam par 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang yang yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba 'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug 
[\[237b.2\]]bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skye ba de la yang chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/'dus byas kyi khams la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshul 
[\[237b.3\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/
[\[237b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de dag gi [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang mtshan nyid la yang chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lus la yang chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/sha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/lha'i mig la 
[\[237b.5\]]chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/shes rab kyi mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/chos kyi mig la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/nang stong 
[\[237b.6\]]pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chen po stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/don dam pa 
[\[237b.7\]]stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/rang gi 
[\[238a.2\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[238a.3\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/dbang po 
[\[238a.4\]]rnams la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/stobs rnams la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[238a.5\]]la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan rnams la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshad med pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad la 
[\[238a.6\]]chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mtshan ma med pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/smon pa med pa la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/

[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]bzhi la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/byams pa chen po la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/snying rje chen po la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la 
[\[238b.2\]]chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/de bzhin nyid la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/chos kyi dbyings la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/
[\[238b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/thabs mkhas pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang chags par byed pa 'am/_/gang gis chags par bya ba 'am/_gang la chags par bya 
[\[238b.4\]]ba de lta bu'i chos thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 
[\[238b.5\]]'phel lo/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/byang chub 
[\[238b.6\]]sems dpa'i skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas kyang /_
[\[238b.7\]]sems can yongs su smin par byed cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]'das rnams blta ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror 
[\[239a.2\]]bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs 
[\[239a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang thos par 'gyur te/_ji skad du thos pa'i chos de dag kyang /_nam bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang thob 
[\[239a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang brdar bya ba'i chos su gdags pa rnams de ltar khong du chud par bya'o//_//
[\[239a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu drug pa/_/rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na zhes smras pa de la rab 'byor de 
[\[239a.6\]]ji snyam du sems/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam ma ma/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems 
[\[239a.7\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[239b.2\]]sems/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_
[\[239b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[239b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_

[\[239b.7\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du shes ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_

[\[240a.2\]]yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du shes med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma

[\[240a.6\]]lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[240a.7\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam

[\[240b.6\]]ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myig [,]mig [}]yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[240b.7\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_

[\[241a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[241a.6\]]sems/_sna la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la sna yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_

[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce ma yin pa gzhan zhig

[\[241b.3\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la lce yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_

[\[241b.6\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[241b.7\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la lus yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[242a.2\]]ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[242a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang

[\[242a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_/gzugs med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[242b.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra 
[\[242b.3\]]ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_
[\[242b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la sgra yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[242b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[242b.6\]]sems/_dri byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[242b.7\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la dri yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[243a.2\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 
[\[243a.3\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags 
[\[243a.4\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji 
[\[243a.5\]]snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la ro yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 
[\[243a.6\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[243a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]du sems/_reg la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la reg yod snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[243b.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[243b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji 
[\[243b.4\]]snyam du sems/_chos ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos la byang chub 
[\[243b.5\]]sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la chos yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[243b.6\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[243b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[244a.2\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams yod snyam mam/_
[\[244a.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[244a.4\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[244a.5\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_/gzugs kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs 
[\[244a.6\]]kyi khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi khams yod snyam 
[\[244a.7\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[244b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[244b.3\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[244b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[244b.5\]]med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[244b.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[244b.7\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[245a.2\]]sems/_rna ba'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i khams byang chub sems 
[\[245a.3\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[245a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das

[\[245a.7\]]sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom

[\[245b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis

[\[245b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]sems/_dri'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri'i khams ma yin pa

[\[246a.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[246a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor

[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de

[\[247a.1\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la ro'i khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan

[\[247a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du

[\[247a.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de

[\[247b.3\]]khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[247b.4\]]ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg bya'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[247b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg bya'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[247b.6\]]du sems/_reg bya'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la reg bya'i 
[\[247b.7\]]khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg bya'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[248a.2\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[248a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rab 
[\[248a.4\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi 
[\[248a.5\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi khams byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[248a.6\]]yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[248a.7\]]ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi 
[\[248b.2\]]khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_
[\[248b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[248b.4\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[248b.5\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig 
[\[248b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[248b.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta 
[\[249a.2\]]ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[249a.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[249a.4\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams ma yin pa 
[\[249a.5\]]gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[249a.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[249a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]sems/_chu'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chu'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[249b.2\]]yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la chu'i khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags 
[\[249b.3\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chu'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[249b.4\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chu'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams byang 
[\[249b.5\]]chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_
[\[249b.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[249b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]du sems/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rlung gi 
[\[250a.2\]]khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rlung gi khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[250a.3\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rlung gi khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[250a.4\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rlung gi khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[250a.5\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rlung gi khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[250a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 
[\[250a.7\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la nam mkha'i khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[250b.2\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[250b.3\]]sems/_rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin 
[\[250b.4\]]pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod 
[\[250b.5\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[250b.6\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[250b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa ma 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa la byang chub sems 
[\[251a.2\]]dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la ma rig pa yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[251a.3\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[251a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed ma yin 
[\[251a.5\]]pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_
[\[251a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[251a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems 
[\[251b.2\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[251b.3\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[251b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji 
[\[251b.5\]]snyam du sems/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ma yin pa gzhan 
[\[251b.6\]]zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[251b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[252a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye mched drug byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye 
[\[252a.3\]]mched drug ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye mched drug la byang chub sems 
[\[252a.4\]]dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la skye mched drug yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[252a.5\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye mched drug [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[252a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg pa ma 
[\[252a.7\]]yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[252b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[252b.3\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba ma yin pa gzhan zhig 
[\[252b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[252b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[252b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sred 
[\[252b.7\]]pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sred pa ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sred pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta 
[\[253a.2\]]ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la sred pa yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[253a.3\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sred pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_len pa byang chub sems 
[\[253a.4\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_len pa ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[253a.5\]]ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_len pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[253a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la len pa yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_len pa med pa 
[\[253a.7\]]zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_srid pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_srid pa ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[253b.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_srid pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[253b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' la srid pa yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_srid pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_
[\[253b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye ba byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[253b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye ba ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[253b.6\]]de ji snyam du sems/_skye ba la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la skye ba 
[\[253b.7\]]yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rga shi byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[254a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rga shi ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji 
[\[254a.3\]]snyam du sems/_rga shi la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi yod snyam 
[\[254a.4\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rga shi [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags 
[\[254a.5\]]so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub 
[\[254a.6\]]sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 
[\[254a.7\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[254b.2\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[254b.3\]]du sems/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan 
[\[254b.4\]]zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_
[\[254b.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[254b.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[254b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]du sems/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de 
[\[255a.2\]]ji snyam du sems/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'du 
[\[255a.3\]]shes kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 
[\[255a.4\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta 
[\[255a.5\]]ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[255a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[255a.7\]]de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed kyi de bzhin 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[255b.2\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[255b.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags 
[\[255b.4\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[255b.5\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[255b.6\]]du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan 
[\[255b.7\]]zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[256a.2\]]ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[256a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[256a.4\]]sems/_rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[256a.5\]]la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_
[\[256a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[256a.7\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[256b.2\]]sna'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_
[\[256b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags 
[\[256b.4\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji 
[\[256b.5\]]snyam du sems/_lce'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce'i de bzhin nyid la 
[\[256b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[256b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[257a.2\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi de 
[\[257a.3\]]bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[257a.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom
