[\[257a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[257a.6\]]yid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems 
[\[257a.7\]]dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[257b.2\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs 
[\[257b.3\]]kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub 
[\[257b.4\]]sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[257b.5\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[257b.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i 
[\[257b.7\]]de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la sgra'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[258a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[258a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji 
[\[258a.4\]]snyam du sems/_dri'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri'i de 
[\[258a.5\]]bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[258a.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[258a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]sems/_ro'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub 
[\[258b.2\]]sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la ro'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[258b.3\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[258b.4\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg gi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg gi de bzhin nyid 
[\[258b.5\]]ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_
[\[258b.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la reg gi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[258b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg gi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]snyam du sems/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi de 
[\[259a.2\]]bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[259a.3\]]yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[259a.4\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[259a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[259a.6\]]sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams 
[\[259a.7\]]kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[259b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[259b.3\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[259b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[259b.5\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi 
[\[259b.6\]]khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin 
[\[259b.7\]]nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub 
[\[260a.2\]]sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_
[\[260a.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[260a.4\]]ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[260a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[260a.6\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems 
[\[260a.7\]]dpa' la rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[260b.2\]]lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[260b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[260b.4\]]de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin 
[\[260b.5\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub 
[\[260b.6\]]sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems 
[\[260b.7\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[261a.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[261a.3\]]ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[261a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[261a.5\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub 
[\[261a.6\]]sems dpa' la sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems 
[\[261a.7\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags 
[\[261b.2\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[261b.3\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_dri'i 
[\[261b.4\]]khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de 
[\[261b.5\]]bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa 
[\[261b.6\]]gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub 
[\[261b.7\]]sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems 
[\[262a.2\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[262a.3\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//_
[\[262a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[262a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[262a.6\]]du sems/_lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[262a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[262b.2\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[262b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[262b.4\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[262b.5\]]sems/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[262b.6\]]du sems/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub 
[\[262b.7\]]sems dpa' la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin 
[\[263a.2\]]nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[263a.3\]]yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[263a.4\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[263a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[263a.6\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg bya'i 
[\[263a.7\]]khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa'i la reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod 
[\[263b.2\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[263b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[263b.4\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[263b.5\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[263b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[263b.7\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]du sems/_yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi 
[\[264a.2\]]khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang 
[\[264a.3\]]chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[264a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[264a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[264a.6\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[264a.7\]]chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi khams kyi de 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[264b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[264b.3\]]lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags 
[\[264b.4\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[264b.5\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[264b.6\]]du sems/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i 
[\[264b.7\]]khams kyi de bzhin nyid/_byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[265a.2\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[265a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[265a.4\]]sems/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa 
[\[265a.5\]]gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 
[\[265a.6\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[265a.7\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[265b.2\]]sems/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi 
[\[265b.3\]]de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_
[\[265b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[265b.5\]]lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[265b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[265b.7\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]dpa' la rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[266a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[266a.3\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_
[\[266a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[266a.5\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[266a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji 
[\[266a.7\]]snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid/_byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[266b.2\]]khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[266b.3\]]kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_
[\[266b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[266b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[266b.6\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang 
[\[266b.7\]]chub sems dpa' la ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_
[\[267a.2\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[267a.3\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[267a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[267a.5\]]'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid byang 
[\[267a.6\]]chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[267a.7\]]yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[267b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[267b.3\]]de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi 
[\[267b.4\]]de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub 
[\[267b.5\]]sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[267b.6\]]ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[267b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[268a.2\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems 
[\[268a.3\]]dpa' la skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems 
[\[268a.4\]]dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[268a.5\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[268a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du 
[\[268a.7\]]sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_reg pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[268b.2\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[268b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de 
[\[268b.4\]]ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig 
[\[268b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[268b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags 
[\[268b.7\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la sred pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam 
[\[269a.2\]]du sems/_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_len pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub 
[\[269a.3\]]sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_len pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol 
[\[269a.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_len pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[269a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la len pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[269a.6\]]len pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_srid pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 
[\[269a.7\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_srid pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[269b.2\]]pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la srid pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_srid pa'i de 
[\[269b.3\]]bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye ba'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 
[\[269b.4\]]mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[269b.5\]]ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skye ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[269b.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la skye ba'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[269b.7\]]skye ba'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[270a.2\]]snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma 
[\[270a.3\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[270a.4\]]rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam 
[\[270a.5\]]po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/_de skad du gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[270a.6\]]ma yin/_gzugs la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs yod pa ma yin/_gzugs med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/tshor ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_tshor ba ma yin pa gzhan 
[\[270a.7\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_tshor ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang tshor ba yod pa ma yin/_tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/'du shes kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]shes ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du shes la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'du shes yod pa ma yin/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du byed kyang byang chub 
[\[270b.2\]]sems dpa' ma yin/_'du byed ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du byed la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'du byed yod pa ma yin/_'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[270b.3\]]yin/_/rnam par shes pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rnam par shes pa yod pa ma 
[\[270b.4\]]yin/_rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[270b.5\]]la yang [{]myig [,]mig [}]yod pa ma yin/_mig med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rna ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems 
[\[270b.6\]]dpa' la yang rna ba yod pa ma yin/_rna ba med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sna yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems 
[\[270b.7\]]dpa' la yang sna yod pa ma yin/_sna med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lce yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]dpa' la yang lce yod pa ma yin/_lce med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lus kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus la yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[271a.2\]]yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus yod pa ma yin/_lus med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/yid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_yid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_yid la yang byang chub sems 
[\[271a.3\]]dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang yid yod pa ma yin/_yid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs la 
[\[271a.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs yod pa ma yin/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sgra ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[271a.5\]]yin/_sgra la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sgra yod pa ma yin/_sgra med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/dri yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_dri ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[271a.6\]]yin/_dri la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang dri yod pa ma yin/_dri med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/ro yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ro ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[271a.7\]]yin/_ro la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang ro yod pa ma yin/_ro med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/reg kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]yin/_reg la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang reg yod pa ma yin/_reg med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chos kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chos ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[271b.2\]]ma yin/_chos la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang chos yod pa ma yin/_chos med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/mig gi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi khams ma yin 
[\[271b.3\]]pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi khams yod pa ma yin/_mig gi khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/gzugs 
[\[271b.4\]]kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs kyi khams 
[\[271b.5\]]yod pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi 
[\[271b.6\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rna ba'i 
[\[271b.7\]]khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i khams yod pa ma yin/_rna ba'i 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sgra'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sgra'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sgra'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[272a.2\]]yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sgra'i khams yod pa ma yin/_sgra'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma 
[\[272a.3\]]yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[272a.4\]]khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sna'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub 
[\[272a.5\]]sems dpa' la yang sna'i khams yod pa ma yin/_sna'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/dri'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_dri'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_dri'i khams 
[\[272a.6\]]la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang dri'i khams yod pa ma yin/_dri'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna'i rnam par 
[\[272a.7\]]shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/_sna'i rnam par 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]shes pa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lce'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang 
[\[272b.2\]]chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i khams yod pa ma yin/_lce'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/ro'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ro'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ro'i khams 
[\[272b.3\]]la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang ro'i khams yod pa ma yin/_ro'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce'i rnam 
[\[272b.4\]]par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/_lce'i 
[\[272b.5\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lus kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus kyi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod 
[\[272b.6\]]pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus kyi khams yod pa ma yin/_lus kyi khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/reg bya'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg bya'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[272b.7\]]dpa' ma yin/_reg bya'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang reg bya'i khams yod pa ma yin/_reg bya'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[273a.2\]]la yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/yid kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_yid kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[273a.3\]]yin/_yid kyi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang yid kyi khams yod pa ma yin/_yid kyi khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/chos kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chos 
[\[273a.4\]]kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chos kyi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang chos kyi khams yod pa ma yin/_chos kyi khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_
[\[273a.5\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems 
[\[273a.6\]]dpa' la yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[273a.7\]]yin/_sa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sa'i khams yod pa ma yin/_sa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/chu'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chu'i khams ma 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chu'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang chu'i khams yod pa ma yin/_chu'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/me'i khams kyang byang chub 
[\[273b.2\]]sems dpa' ma yin/_me'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_me'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang me'i khams yod pa ma yin/_me'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems 
[\[273b.3\]]dpa' ma yin/_/rlung gi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rlung gi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rlung gi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rlung gi khams yod pa ma yin/_
[\[273b.4\]]rlung gi khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/nam mkha'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_nam mkha'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_nam mkha'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_
[\[273b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' la yang nam mkha'i khams yod pa ma yin/_nam mkha'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan 
[\[273b.6\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[273b.7\]]yin/_/ma rig pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ma rig pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ma rig pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang ma rig pa yod pa ma yin/_ma rig pa med 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/'du byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du byed ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du byed la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[274a.2\]]la yang 'du byed yod pa ma yin/_'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rnam par shes pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa la yang byang chub 
[\[274a.3\]]sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/ming dang gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ming dang gzugs ma yin pa gzhan 
[\[274a.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ming dang gzugs la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang ming dang gzugs yod pa ma yin/_ming dang gzugs med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/skye mched drug 
[\[274a.5\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_skye mched drug ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_skye mched drug la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang skye mched drug yod pa ma yin/_skye mched drug med 
[\[274a.6\]]pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/reg pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang reg pa yod pa ma 
[\[274a.7\]]yin/_reg pa med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/tshor ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_tshor ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_tshor ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]tshor ba yod pa ma yin/_tshor ba med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sred pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sred pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sred pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub 
[\[274b.2\]]sems dpa' la yang sred pa yod pa ma yin/_sred pa med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/len pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_len pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_len pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod 
[\[274b.3\]]pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang len pa yod pa ma yin/_len pa med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/srid pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_srid pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_srid pa la yang byang 
[\[274b.4\]]chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang srid pa yod pa ma yin/_srid pa med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/skye ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_skye ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_
[\[274b.5\]]skye ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang skye ba yod pa ma yin/_skye ba med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rga shi yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rga shi ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[274b.6\]]dpa' ma yin/_rga shi la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rga shi yod pa ma yin/_rga shi med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs 
[\[274b.7\]]kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub 
[\[275a.2\]]sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du shes 
[\[275a.3\]]kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid med pa 
[\[275a.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_
[\[275a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan 
[\[275a.6\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub 
[\[275a.7\]]sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]yang mig gi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_mig gi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba'i de bzhin 
[\[275b.2\]]nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_rna ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sna'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna'i de 
[\[275b.3\]]bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sna'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_sna'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[275b.4\]]yin/_lce'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i de bzhin nyid yod 
[\[275b.5\]]pa ma yin/_lce'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems 
[\[275b.6\]]dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_lus kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa 
[\[275b.7\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang yid kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/gzugs 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems 
[\[276a.2\]]dpa' la yang /_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sgra'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sgra'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma 
[\[276a.3\]]yin/_sgra'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sgra'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_sgra'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/dri'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[276a.4\]]ma yin/_dri'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_dri'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang dri'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_dri'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub 
[\[276a.5\]]sems dpa' ma yin/_/ro'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ro'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ro'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang ro'i 
[\[276a.6\]]de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_ro'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg gi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg gi de bzhin nyid la yang 
[\[276a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang reg gi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_reg gi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chos kyi de bzhin 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang chos kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[276b.2\]]ma yin/_/mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang 
[\[276b.3\]]chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams kyi de 
[\[276b.4\]]bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams 
[\[276b.5\]]kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_
[\[276b.6\]]mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[276b.7\]]med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 
[\[277a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sgra'i khams kyi de 
[\[277a.3\]]bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin 
[\[277a.4\]]pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_
[\[277a.5\]]rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/
[\[277a.6\]]sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/dri'i khams kyi de 
[\[277a.7\]]bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang dri'i khams 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa 
[\[277b.2\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_sna'i rnam 
[\[277b.3\]]par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce'i khams kyi 
[\[277b.4\]]de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang 
[\[277b.5\]]chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma 
[\[277b.6\]]yin/_ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[277b.7\]]sems dpa' ma yin/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_
[\[278a.2\]]lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/reg bya'i 
[\[278a.3\]]khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems 
[\[278a.4\]]dpa' la yang reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus kyi rnam 
[\[278a.5\]]par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus kyi rnam par shes 
[\[278a.6\]]pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma 
[\[278a.7\]]yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems 
[\[278b.2\]]dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub 
[\[278b.3\]]sems dpa' ma yin/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub 
[\[278b.4\]]sems dpa' la yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[278b.5\]]ma yin/_sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_
[\[278b.6\]]sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[278b.7\]]la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]dpa' ma yin/_me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang me'i khams kyi 
[\[279a.2\]]de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_
[\[279a.3\]]rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi de 
[\[279a.4\]]bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang nam 
[\[279a.5\]]mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa 
[\[279a.6\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin 
[\[279a.7\]]nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan 
[\[279b.2\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_
[\[279b.3\]]rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub 
[\[279b.4\]]sems dpa' la yang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_ming dang gzugs kyi de 
[\[279b.5\]]bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_ming dang gzugs kyi de 
[\[279b.6\]]bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub 
[\[279b.7\]]sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg pa'i de 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_reg pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_reg pa'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[280a.2\]]med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_
[\[280a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' la yang tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[280a.4\]]dpa' ma yin/_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang sred pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang 
[\[280a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_len pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_len pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang len pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_len 
[\[280a.6\]]pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_srid pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod 
[\[280a.7\]]pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang srid pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_srid pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_skye ba'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang skye ba'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/_skye ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_/rga shi'i de 
[\[280b.2\]]bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' la yang rga shi'i de bzhin
