[\[376b.3\]]'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[376b.4\]]sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong /_snying rje 
[\[376b.5\]]chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/_bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang byams pa chen po ma lags/_de yang snying rje chen po ma lags/_byams pa chen 
[\[376b.6\]]po dang snying rje chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[376b.7\]]sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[377a.2\]]pa rnams kyis stong ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_sangs 
[\[377a.3\]]rgya sa kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[377a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yi ge rnams la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_yi ge mngon par 
[\[377a.5\]]bsgrub pa la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams 
[\[377a.6\]]kyis stong ste/_yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yi ge rnams ma lags/_yi ge rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des 
[\[377a.7\]]na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yi ge rnams la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags 
[\[377b.2\]]pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/_mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 
[\[377b.3\]]des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes 
[\[377b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 
[\[377b.5\]]rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[377b.6\]]'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[377b.7\]]dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/_gzungs 
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams 
[\[378a.2\]]so/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[378a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyis stong 
[\[378a.4\]]ste/_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[378a.5\]]rtag pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[378a.6\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 
[\[378a.7\]]tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid ma lags/_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i 
[\[378b.2\]]slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid ma lags/_'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid las gud na yang 
[\[378b.3\]]stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[378b.4\]]'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed mi rtag go 
[\[378b.5\]]zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid 'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/_'du byed 
[\[378b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[378b.7\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/_rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid ma lags/_rnam par shes 
[\[379a.2\]]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[379a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs 
[\[379a.4\]]sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/_gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags 
[\[379a.5\]]pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/_gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[379a.6\]]'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[379a.7\]]tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/_tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de 
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]yang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/_tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang 
[\[379b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/_tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar 
[\[379b.3\]]gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/_'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes sdug bsngal 
[\[379b.4\]]ba nyid ma lags/_'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub 
[\[379b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas 
[\[379b.6\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/_'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags 
[\[379b.7\]]'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas 
[\[380a.2\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa 
[\[380a.3\]]sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam 
[\[380a.4\]]grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[380a.5\]]chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyis stong 
[\[380a.6\]]ste/_gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ma lags/_gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[380a.7\]]gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_des shes 
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor ba bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das/_de ni 'di ltar tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[380b.2\]]nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ma lags/_tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[380b.3\]]'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor ba bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[380b.4\]]'du shes bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes bdag med pa nyid 'du shes bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du shes bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang 
[\[380b.5\]]lags pa de yang 'du shes bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ma lags/_'du shes bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du shes bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'a du shes bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[380b.6\]]'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[380b.7\]]pa'i tshe/_'du byed bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid 'du byed bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du byed bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyi 
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ma lags/_'du byed bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed 
[\[381a.2\]]bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi 
[\[381a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_
[\[381a.4\]]rnam par shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ma lags/_rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam 
[\[381a.5\]]par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[381a.6\]]'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs 
[\[381a.7\]]zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/_gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags/_gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do/_/
[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor 
[\[381b.2\]]ba zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba zhi ba nyid tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/_tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba zhi ba nyid ma lags/_tshor ba zhi ba nyid 
[\[381b.3\]]las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba zhi ba nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[381b.4\]]tshor ba zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes zhi ba nyid 'du shes zhi ba 
[\[381b.5\]]nyid kyis stong ste/_'du shes zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes zhi ba nyid ma lags/_'du shes zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du shes zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes zhi ba nyid do/_/
[\[381b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[381b.7\]]'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed zhi ba nyid 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/_'du byed zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed zhi ba nyid ma lags/_
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]'du byed zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du byed zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed zhi ba nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[382a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[382a.3\]]'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/_rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid ma lags/_rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa 
[\[382a.4\]]nyid ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[382a.5\]]rnam par shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i 
[\[382a.6\]]slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_gzugs stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags/_gzugs stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid 
[\[382a.7\]]ma mchis te/_gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/_gzugs 
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba stong pa nyid tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[382b.2\]]stong ste/_tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba stong pa nyid ma lags/_tshor ba stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba stong pa nyid do/_bcom ldan 
[\[382b.3\]]'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes stong 
[\[382b.4\]]ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes stong pa nyid 'du shes stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du shes stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes stong pa nyid ma lags/_
[\[382b.5\]]'du shes stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du shes stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi 
[\[382b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[382b.7\]]ni 'di ltar 'du byed stong pa nyid 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du byed stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed stong pa nyid ma lags/_'du byed stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du byed stong pa 
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi 
[\[383a.2\]]bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid rnam par 
[\[383a.3\]]shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma lags/_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa stong pa 
[\[383a.4\]]nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid do/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi 
[\[383a.5\]]bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe 
[\[383a.6\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/_gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/_gzugs mtshan 
[\[383a.7\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_gzugs mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du 
[\[383b.2\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid tshor ba mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/_tshor ba mtshan ma 
[\[383b.3\]]med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab 
[\[383b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[383b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid 'du shes mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du shes mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ma lags/_'du shes mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[383b.6\]]pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du shes mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes 
[\[383b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ma lags/_'du 
[\[384a.2\]]byed mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du byed mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[384a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du 
[\[384a.4\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid rnam par shes pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ma 
[\[384a.5\]]lags/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub

[\[384a.7\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid 
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/_gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom 
[\[384b.2\]]ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[384b.3\]]tshor ba smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid tshor ba smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyis stong ste/_tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor

[\[384b.6\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du shes smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ma lags/_'du shes smon pa 
[\[384b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du shes smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi 
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad

[\[385a.3\]]las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol

[\[385a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes 
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/_gzugs dben pa nyid 
[\[385b.2\]]kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags/_gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_gzugs dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs dben pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[385b.3\]]'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshor 
[\[385b.4\]]ba dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dben pa nyid tshor ba dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/_tshor ba dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba dben pa nyid ma 
[\[385b.5\]]lags/_tshor ba dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_tshor ba dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba dben pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]]mchis te/_'du shes dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes dben pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[386a.2\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed 
[\[386a.3\]]dben pa nyid 'du byed dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du byed dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed dben pa nyid ma lags/_'du byed dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du byed dben pa nyid kyang stong pa 
[\[386a.4\]]nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed dben pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du byed dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/
[\[386a.5\]]des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong

[\[386a.7\]]nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin nyid la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin

[\[386b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin nyid la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

[\[386b.6\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_chos nyid la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi dbyings la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe 
[\[386b.7\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_chos kyi dbyings las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi dbyings la gnas 
[\[387a.2\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 
[\[387a.3\]]'di ltar chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/_chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid ma lags/_chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa

[\[387a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i 
[\[387a.6\]]mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/_yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[387a.7\]]kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang 
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_gzugs la gnas na de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_
[\[387b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i 
[\[387b.3\]]yid kyis tshor ba la gnas na/_de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs 
[\[387b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_'du shes la gnas na de 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[387b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_'du byed la gnas na de 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi 
[\[387b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_
[\[387b.7\]]rnam par shes pa la gnas na/_de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes 
[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/_rnam 
[\[388a.2\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la 
[\[388a.3\]]gnas pa'i yid kyis/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]la gnas na de [{]myig [,]mig [}]mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[388a.4\]]thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba la gnas na/_de rna ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[388a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna la gnas na/_de sna mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[388a.6\]]la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce la gnas na/_de lce 
[\[388a.7\]]mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba 
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_lus la gnas na de lus mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[388b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid la gnas na/_/de yid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[388b.3\]]du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te shes 
[\[388b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi 
[\[388b.5\]]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang /_bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_gzugs la gnas na de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[388b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_sgra la gnas na/_de sgra mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[388b.7\]]pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_dri la gnas na 
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]de dri mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs

[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]]pa la gnas na/_de [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

[\[390a\]]
[\[390a.1\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas na/_de yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_
[\[390a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[390a.3\]]pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[390a.4\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/_de [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_

[\[390a.6\]]kyis/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/_de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[390a.7\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/[ (]da [,]de [)]sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi 
[\[390b\]]
[\[390b.1\]]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang /_bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa

[\[390b.5\]]de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas na/_de [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems

[\[391a.3\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas 
[\[391a.4\]]bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas na/_de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/

[\[391a.6\]]ba la gnas na/_de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[391a.7\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas na/_de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_
[\[391b\]]
[\[391b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid

[\[391b.3\]]ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[391b.4\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas 
[\[391b.5\]]bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_sa'i khams la gnas na/_de sa'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'

[\[391b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 
[\[392a\]]
[\[392a.1\]{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la gnas na de [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

[\[392a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_nam mkha'i khams la gnas na 
[\[392a.4\]]de nam mkha'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi 
[\[392a.5\]]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas na/_de rnam par shes pa'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/
[\[392a.6\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par

[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_ma rig pa la gnas na de ma rig pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[392b.2\]]'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_'du byed la gnas na de 'du byed mngon par 'du 
[\[392b.3\]]bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag 
[\[392b.4\]]gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_rnam par shes pa la gnas na de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[392b.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la gnas na de [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi 
[\[392b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_
[\[392b.7\]]skye mched drug la gnas na/_de skye mched drug mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[393a\]]
[\[393a.1\]]pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_reg pa la gnas na de reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/
[\[393a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_tshor ba la gnas na de tshor ba mngon 
[\[393a.3\]]par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang 
[\[393a.4\]]bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_sred pa la gnas na de sred pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[393a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis len pa la gnas na/_de len pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/
[\[393a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_srid pa la gnas na de srid pa 
[\[393a.7\]]mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang 
[\[393b\]]
[\[393b.1\]]bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_skye ba la gnas na de skye ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[393b.2\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_rga shi la gnas na/_de rga shi mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[393b.3\]]mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[393b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas 
[\[393b.5\]]pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal 
[\[393b.6\]]te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/_de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu 
[\[393b.7\]]phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang /_
[\[394a\]]
[\[394a.1\]]bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[394a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/_de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[394a.3\]]pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi 
[\[394a.4\]]ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/_de bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[394a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[394a.6\]]pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/_
[\[394a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//_//
